GV01rv_02_u:1: RV_02.001.01.2{17} tvaṃ vanebhyastvamoṣadhībhyastvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ
GV01rv_02_u:2: RV_02.001.02.1{17} tavāgne hotraṃ tava potraṃ ṛtviyaṃ tava neṣṭraṃ tvamagnid ṛtāyataḥ
GV01rv_02_u:3: RV_02.001.02.2{17} tava praśāstraṃ tvamadhvarīyasi brahmā cāsi gṛhapatiśca no dame
GV01rv_02_u:4: RV_02.001.03.1{17} tvamagna indro vṛṣabhaḥ satāmasi tvaṃ viṣṇururugāyo namasyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:5: RV_02.001.03.2{17} tvaṃ brahmā rayivid brahmaṇas pate tvaṃ vidhartaḥsacase purandhyā
GV01rv_02_u:6: RV_02.001.04.1{17} tvamagne rājā varuṇo dhṛtavratastvaṃ mitro bhavasi dasma īḍyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:7: RV_02.001.04.2{17} tvamaryamā satpatiryasya sambhujaṃ tvamaṃśo vidathe deva bhājayuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:8: RV_02.001.05.1{17} tvamagne tvaṣṭā vidhate suvīryaṃ tava gnāvo mitramahaḥ sajātyam
GV01rv_02_u:9: RV_02.001.05.2{17} tvamāśuhemā rariṣe svaśvyaṃ tvaṃ narāṃ śardho asi purūvasuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:10: RV_02.001.06.1{18} tvamagne rudro asuro maho divastvaṃ śardho mārutaṃ pṛkṣa īśiṣe
GV01rv_02_u:11: RV_02.001.06.2{18} tvaṃ vātairaruṇairyāsi śaṃgayastvaṃ pūṣā vidhataḥ pāsi nu tmanā
GV01rv_02_u:12: RV_02.001.07.1{18} tvamagne draviṇodā araṃkṛte tvaṃ devaḥ savitā ratnadhāasi
GV01rv_02_u:13: RV_02.001.07.2{18} tvaṃ bhago nṛpate vasva īśiṣe tvaṃ pāyurdame yaste'vidhat
GV01rv_02_u:14: RV_02.001.08.1{18} tvamagne dama ā viśpatiṃ viśastvāṃ rājānaṃ suvidatraṃ ṛñjate
GV01rv_02_u:15: RV_02.001.08.2{18} tvaṃ viśvāni svanīka patyase tvaṃ sahasrāṇi śatā daśa prati
GV01rv_02_u:16: RV_02.001.09.1{18} tvāmagne pitaramiṣṭibhirnarastvāṃ bhrātrāya śamyā tanūrucam
GV01rv_02_u:17: RV_02.001.09.2{18} tvaṃ putro bhavasi yaste 'vidhat tvaṃ sakhā suśevaḥ pāsyādhṛṣaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:18: RV_02.001.10.1{18} tvamagna ṛbhurāke namasyastvaṃ vājasya kṣumato rāya īśiṣe
GV01rv_02_u:19: RV_02.001.10.2{18} tvaṃ vi bhāsyanu dakṣi dāvane tvaṃ viśikṣurasiyajñamātaniḥ
GV01rv_02_u:20: RV_02.001.11.1{19} tvamagne aditirdeva dāśuṣe tvaṃ hotrā bhāratī vardhasegirā
GV01rv_02_u:21: RV_02.001.11.2{19} tvamiḷā ṣatahimāsi dakṣase tvaṃ vṛtrahā vasupate sarasvatī
GV01rv_02_u:22: RV_02.001.12.1{19} tvamagne subhṛta uttamaṃ vayastava spārhe varṇa ā sandṛśi śriyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:23: RV_02.001.12.2{19} tvaṃ vājaḥ prataraṇo bṛhannasi tvaṃ rayirbahulo viśvatas pṛthuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:24: RV_02.001.13.1{19} tvāmagna ādityāsa āsyaṃ tvāṃ jihvāṃ śucayaścakrirekave
GV01rv_02_u:25: RV_02.001.13.2{19} tvāṃ rātiṣāco adhvareṣu saścire tve devā haviradantyāhutam
GV01rv_02_u:26: RV_02.001.14.1{19} tve agne viśve anṛtāso adruha āsā devā haviradantyāhutam
GV01rv_02_u:27: RV_02.001.14.2{19} tvayā martāsaḥ svadanta āsutiṃ tvaṃ garbho vīrudhāṃ jajñiṣe śuciḥ
GV01rv_02_u:28: RV_02.001.15.1{19} tvaṃ tān saṃ ca prati cāsi majmanāgne sujāta pra ca devaricyase
GV01rv_02_u:29: RV_02.001.15.2{19} pṛkṣo yadatra mahinā vi te bhuvadanu dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī ubhe
GV01rv_02_u:30: RV_02.001.16.1{19} ye stotṛbhyo goagrāmaśvapeśasamagne rātimupasṛjanti sūrayaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:31: RV_02.001.16.2{19} asmāñca tāṃśca pra hi neṣi vasya ā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:32: RV_02.002.01.1{20} yajñena vardhata jātavedasamagniṃ yajadhvaṃ haviṣā tanā girā
GV01rv_02_u:33: RV_02.002.01.2{20} samidhānaṃ suprayasaṃ svarṇaraṃ dyukṣaṃ hotāraṃvṛjaneṣu dhūrṣadam
GV01rv_02_u:34: RV_02.002.02.1{20} abhi tvā naktīruṣaso vavāśire 'gne vatsaṃ na svasareṣudhenavaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:35: RV_02.002.02.2{20} diva ivedaratirmānuṣā yugā kṣapo bhāsi puruvāra saṃyataḥ
GV01rv_02_u:36: RV_02.002.03.1{20} taṃ devā budhne rajasaḥ sudaṃsasaṃ divaspṛthivyoraratiṃnyerire
GV01rv_02_u:37: RV_02.002.03.2{20} rathamiva vedyaṃ śukraśociṣamagniṃ mitraṃ nakṣitiṣu praśaṃsyam
GV01rv_02_u:38: RV_02.002.04.1{20} tamukṣamāṇaṃ rajasi sva ā dame candramiva surucaṃ hvāra ā dadhuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:39: RV_02.002.04.2{20} pṛśnyāḥ pataraṃ citayantamakṣabhiḥ pātho na pāyuṃ janasī ubhe anu
GV01rv_02_u:40: RV_02.002.05.1{20} sa hotā viśvaṃ pari bhūtvadhvaraṃ tamu havyairmanuṣa ṛñjate girā
GV01rv_02_u:41: RV_02.002.05.2{20} hiriśipro vṛdhasānāsu jarbhurad dyaurna stṛbhiścitayad rodasī anu
GV01rv_02_u:42: RV_02.002.06.1{21} sa no revat samidhānaḥ svastaye sandadasvān rayimasmāsu dīdihi
GV01rv_02_u:43: RV_02.002.06.2{21} ā naḥ kṛṇuṣva suvitāya rodasī agne havyā manuṣodeva vītaye
GV01rv_02_u:44: RV_02.002.07.1{21} dā no agne bṛhato dāḥ sahasriṇo duro na vājaṃ śrutyā apā vṛdhi
GV01rv_02_u:45: RV_02.002.07.2{21} prācī dyāvāpṛthivī brahmaṇā kṛdhi svarṇa śukramuṣaso vi didyutaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:46: RV_02.002.08.1{21} sa idhāna uṣaso rāmyā anu svarṇa dīdedaruṣeṇa bhānunā
GV01rv_02_u:48: RV_02.002.09.1{21} evā no agne amṛteṣu pūrvya dhīṣ pīpāya bṛhaddiveṣu mānuṣā
GV01rv_02_u:49: RV_02.002.09.2{21} duhānā dhenurvṛjaneṣu kārave tmanā śatinaṃ pururūpamiṣaṇi
GV01rv_02_u:50: RV_02.002.10.1{21} vayamagne arvatā vā suvīryaṃ brahmaṇā vā citayemā janānati
GV01rv_02_u:51: RV_02.002.10.2{21} asmākaṃ dyumnamadhi pañca kṛṣṭiṣūccā svarṇaśuśucīta duṣṭaram
GV01rv_02_u:52: RV_02.002.11.1{21} sa no bodhi sahasya praśaṃsyo yasmin sujātā iṣayanta sūrayaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:53: RV_02.002.11.2{21} yamagne yajñamupayanti vājino nitye toke dīdivāṃsaṃ sve dame
GV01rv_02_u:54: RV_02.002.12.1{21} ubhayāso jātavedaḥ syāma te stotāro agne sūrayaśca śarmaṇi
GV01rv_02_u:55: RV_02.002.12.2{21} vasvo rāyaḥ puruścandrasya bhūyasaḥ prajāvataḥ svapatyasya śagdhi naḥ
GV01rv_02_u:57: RV_02.003.01.1{22} samiddho agnirnihitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pratyaṃ viśvāni bhuvanānyasthāt
GV01rv_02_u:58: RV_02.003.01.2{22} hotā pāvakaḥ pradivaḥ sumedhā devo devān yajatvagnirarhan
GV01rv_02_u:59: RV_02.003.02.1{22} narāśaṃsaḥ prati dhāmānyañjan tisro divaḥ prati mahnā svarciḥ
GV01rv_02_u:60: RV_02.003.02.2{22} ghṛtapruṣā manasā havyamundan mūrdhan yajñasya samanaktu devān
GV01rv_02_u:61: RV_02.003.03.1{22} īḷito agne manasā no arhan devān yakṣi mānuṣāt pūrvo adya
GV01rv_02_u:62: RV_02.003.03.2{22} sa ā vaha marutāṃ śardho acyutamindraṃ naro barhiṣadaṃ yajadhvam
GV01rv_02_u:63: RV_02.003.04.1{22} deva barhirvardhamānaṃ suvīraṃ stīrṇaṃ rāye subharaṃ vedyasyām
GV01rv_02_u:64: RV_02.003.04.2{22} ghṛtenāktaṃ vasavaḥ sīdatedaṃ viśve devā ādityā yajñiyāsaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:65: RV_02.003.05.1{22} vi śrayantāmurviyā hūyamānā dvāro devīḥ suprāyaṇā namobhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:66: RV_02.003.05.2{22} vyacasvatīrvi prathantāmajuryā varṇaṃ punānāyaśasaṃ suvīram
GV01rv_02_u:67: RV_02.003.06.1{23} sādhvapāṃsi sanatā na ukṣite uṣāsānaktā vayyeva raṇvite
GV01rv_02_u:68: RV_02.003.06.2{23} tantuṃ tataṃ saṃvayantī samīcī yajñasya peśaḥ sudughe payasvatī
GV01rv_02_u:69: RV_02.003.07.1{23} daivyā hotārā prathamā viduṣṭara ṛju yakṣataḥ saṃ ṛcāvapuṣṭarā
GV01rv_02_u:70: RV_02.003.07.2{23} devān yajantāv ṛtuthā samañjato nābhā pṛthivyā adhi sānuṣu triṣu
GV01rv_02_u:71: RV_02.003.08.1{23} sarasvatī sādhayantī dhiyaṃ na iḷā devī bhāratī viśvatūrtiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:72: RV_02.003.08.2{23} tisro devīḥ svadhayā barhiredamachidraṃ pāntuśaraṇaṃ niṣadya
GV01rv_02_u:73: RV_02.003.09.1{23} piśaṅgarūpaḥ subharo vayodhāḥ śruṣṭī vīro jāyate devakāmaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:74: RV_02.003.09.2{23} prajāṃ tvaṣṭā vi ṣyatu nābhimasme athā devānāmapyetu pāthaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:75: RV_02.003.10.1{23} vanaspatiravasṛjannupa sthādagnirhaviḥ sūdayāti pra dhībhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:76: RV_02.003.10.2{23} tridhā samaktaṃ nayatu prajānan devebhyo daivyaḥ śamitopa havyam
GV01rv_02_u:77: RV_02.003.11.1{23} ghṛtaṃ mimikṣe ghṛtamasya yonirghṛte śrito ghṛtaṃ vasya dhāma
GV01rv_02_u:78: RV_02.003.11.2{23} anuṣvadhamā vaha mādayasva svāhākṛtaṃ vṛṣabha vakṣi havyam
GV01rv_02_u:79: RV_02.004.01.1{24} huve vaḥ sudyotmānaṃ suvṛktiṃ viśāmagnimatithiṃ suprayasam
GV01rv_02_u:80: RV_02.004.01.2{24} mitra iva yo didhiṣāyyo bhūd deva ādeve jane jātavedāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:81: RV_02.004.02.1{24} imaṃ vidhanto apāṃ sadhasthe dvitādadhurbhṛgavo vikṣvāyoḥ
GV01rv_02_u:83: RV_02.004.03.1{24} agniṃ devāso mānuṣīṣu vikṣu priyaṃ dhuḥ kṣeṣyanto namitram
GV01rv_02_u:84: RV_02.004.03.2{24} sa dīdayaduśatīrūrmyā ā dakṣāyyo yo dāsvate dama ā
GV01rv_02_u:85: RV_02.004.04.1{24} asya raṇvā svasyeva puṣṭiḥ sandṛṣṭirasya hiyānasya dakṣoḥ
GV01rv_02_u:86: RV_02.004.04.2{24} vi yo bharibhradoṣadhīṣu jihvāmatyo na rathyo dodhavīti vārān
GV01rv_02_u:87: RV_02.004.05.1{24} ā yan me abhvaṃ vanadaḥ panantośigbhyo nāmimīta varṇam
GV01rv_02_u:88: RV_02.004.05.2{24} sa citreṇa cikite raṃsu bhāsā jujurvān yo muhurā yuvā bhūt
GV01rv_02_u:89: RV_02.004.06.1{25} ā yo vanā tātṛṣāṇo na bhāti vārṇa pathā rathyevasvānīt
GV01rv_02_u:90: RV_02.004.06.2{25} kṛṣṇādhvā tapū raṇvaściketa dyauriva smayamāno nabhobhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:91: RV_02.004.07.1{25} sa yo vyasthādabhi dakṣadurvīṃ paśurnaiti svayuragopāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:92: RV_02.004.07.2{25} agniḥ śociṣmānatasānyuṣṇan kṛṣṇavyathirasvadayan na bhūma
GV01rv_02_u:93: RV_02.004.08.1{25} nū te pūrvasyāvaso adhītau tṛtīye vidathe manma śaṃsi
GV01rv_02_u:94: RV_02.004.08.2{25} asme agne saṃyadvīraṃ bṛhantaṃ kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ svapatyaṃrayiṃ dāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:95: RV_02.004.09.1{25} tvayā yathā gṛtsamadāso agne guhā vanvanta uparānabhi ṣyuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:96: RV_02.004.09.2{25} suvīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ smat sūribhyo gṛṇate tad vayo dhāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:97: RV_02.005.01.1{26} hotājaniṣṭa cetanaḥ pitā pitṛbhya ūtaye
GV01rv_02_u:98: RV_02.005.01.2{26} prayakṣañ jenyaṃ vasu śakema vājino yamam
GV01rv_02_u:99: RV_02.005.02.1{26} ā yasmin sapta raśmayastatā yajñasya netari
GV01rv_02_u:100: RV_02.005.02.2{26} manuṣvad daivyamaṣṭamaṃ potā viśvaṃ tadinvati
GV01rv_02_u:101: RV_02.005.03.1{26} dadhanve vā yadīmanu vocad brahmāṇi veru tat
GV01rv_02_u:103: RV_02.005.04.1{26} sākaṃ hi śucinā śuciḥ praśāstā kratunājani
GV01rv_02_u:104: RV_02.005.04.2{26} vidvānasya vratā dhruvā vayā ivānu rohate
GV01rv_02_u:105: RV_02.005.05.1{26} tā asya varṇamāyuvo neṣṭuḥ sacanta dhenavaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:106: RV_02.005.05.2{26} kuvit tisṛbhya ā varaṃ svasāro yā idaṃ yayuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:107: RV_02.005.06.1{26} yadī māturupa svasā ghṛtaṃ bharantyasthita
GV01rv_02_u:109: RV_02.005.07.1{26} svaḥ svāya dhāyase kṛṇutāṃ ṛtvig ṛtvijam
GV01rv_02_u:110: RV_02.005.07.2{26} stomaṃ yajñaṃ cādaraṃ vanemā rarimā vayam
GV01rv_02_u:111: RV_02.005.08.1{26} yatha vidvānaraṃ karad viśvebhyo yajatebhyaḥ ayamagne tve api yaṃ yajñaṃ cakṛmā vayam
GV01rv_02_u:112: RV_02.006.01.1{27} imāṃ me agne samidhamimāmupasadaṃ vaneḥ
GV01rv_02_u:113: RV_02.006.01.2{27} imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:114: RV_02.006.02.1{27} ayā te agne vidhemorjo napādaśvamiṣṭe
GV01rv_02_u:116: RV_02.006.03.1{27} taṃ tvā gīrbhirgirvaṇasaṃ draviṇasyuṃ draviṇodaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:118: RV_02.006.04.1{27} sa bodhi sūrirmaghavā vasupate vasudāvan
GV01rv_02_u:120: RV_02.006.05.1{27} sa no vṛṣtiṃ divas pari sa no vājamanarvāṇam
GV01rv_02_u:122: RV_02.006.06.1{27} īḷānāyāvasyave yaviṣṭha dūta no girā
GV01rv_02_u:124: RV_02.006.07.1{27} antarhyagna īyase vidvān janmobhayā kave
GV01rv_02_u:126: RV_02.006.08.1{27} sa vidvānā ca piprayo yakṣi cikitva ānuṣak
GV01rv_02_u:128: RV_02.007.01.1{28} śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratāgne dyumantamā bhara
GV01rv_02_u:130: RV_02.007.02.1{28} mā no arātirīśata devasya martyasya ca
GV01rv_02_u:132: RV_02.007.03.1{28} viśvā uta tvayā vayaṃ dhārā udanyā iva
GV01rv_02_u:134: RV_02.007.04.1{28} śuciḥ pāvaka vandyo 'gne bṛhad vi rocase
GV01rv_02_u:136: RV_02.007.05.1{28} tvaṃ no asi bhāratāgne vaśābhirukṣabhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:138: RV_02.007.06.1{28} drvannaḥ sarpirāsutiḥ pratno hotā vareṇyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:140: RV_02.008.01.1{29} vājayanniva nū rathān yogānagnerupa stuhi
GV01rv_02_u:144: RV_02.008.03.1{29} ya u śriyā dameṣvā doṣoṣasi praśasyate
GV01rv_02_u:146: RV_02.008.04.1{29} ā yaḥ svarṇa bhānunā citro vibhātyarciṣā
GV01rv_02_u:152: RV_02.009.01.1{01} ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidānastveṣo dīdivānasadat sudakṣaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:154: RV_02.009.02.1{01} tvaṃ dūtastvamu naḥ paraspāstvaṃ vasya ā vṛṣabha praṇetā
GV01rv_02_u:155: RV_02.009.02.2{01} agne tokasya nastane tanūnāmaprayuchan dīdyad bodhi gopāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:156: RV_02.009.03.1{01} vidhema te parame janmannagne vidhema stomairavare sadhasthe
GV01rv_02_u:157: RV_02.009.03.2{01} yasmād yonerudārithā yaje taṃ pra tve havīṃṣi juhuresamiddhe
GV01rv_02_u:158: RV_02.009.04.1{01} agne yajasva haviṣā yajīyāñchruṣṭī deṣṇamabhi gṛṇīhi rādhaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:159: RV_02.009.04.2{01} tvaṃ hyasi rayipatī rayīṇāṃ tvaṃ śukrasya vacaso manotā
GV01rv_02_u:160: RV_02.009.05.1{01} ubhayaṃ te na kṣīyate vasavyaṃ dive-dive jāyamānasya dasma
GV01rv_02_u:161: RV_02.009.05.2{01} kṛdhi kṣumantaṃ jaritāramagne kṛdhi patiṃ svapatyasya rāyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:162: RV_02.009.06.1{01} sainānīkena suvidatro asme yaṣṭā devānāyajiṣṭhaḥ svasti
GV01rv_02_u:163: RV_02.009.06.2{01} adabdho gopā uta naḥ paraspā agne dyumaduta revad didīhi
GV01rv_02_u:164: RV_02.010.01.1{02} johūtro agniḥ prathamaḥ piteveḷas pade manuṣā yat samiddhaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:165: RV_02.010.01.2{02} śriyaṃ vasāno amṛto vicetā marmṛjenyaḥ śravasyaḥsa vājī
GV01rv_02_u:166: RV_02.010.02.1{02} śrūyā agniścitrabhānurhavaṃ me viśvābhirgīrbhiramṛto vicetāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:167: RV_02.010.02.2{02} śyāvā rathaṃ vahato rohitā votāruṣāha cakre vibhṛtraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:168: RV_02.010.03.1{02} uttānāyāmajanayan suṣūtaṃ bhuvadagniḥ purupeśāsu garbhaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:169: RV_02.010.03.2{02} śiriṇāyāṃ cidaktunā mahobhiraparīvṛto vasati pracetāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:170: RV_02.010.04.1{02} jigharmyagniṃ haviṣā ghṛtena pratikṣiyantaṃ bhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_02_u:171: RV_02.010.04.2{02} pṛthuṃ tiraścā vayasā bṛhantaṃ vyaciṣṭhamannai rabhasaṃ dṛśānam
GV01rv_02_u:172: RV_02.010.05.1{02} ā viśvataḥ pratyañcaṃ jigharmyarakṣasā manasā tajjuṣeta
GV01rv_02_u:173: RV_02.010.05.2{02} maryaśrīḥ spṛhayadvarṇo agnirnābhimṛśe tanvā jarbhurāṇaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:174: RV_02.010.06.1{02} jñeyā bhāgaṃ sahasāno vareṇa tvādūtāso manuvad vadema
GV01rv_02_u:175: RV_02.010.06.2{02} anūnamagniṃ juhvā vacasyā madhupṛcaṃ dhanasājohavīmi
GV01rv_02_u:176: RV_02.011.01.1{03} śrudhī havamindra mā riśaṇyaḥ syāma te dāvane vasūnām
GV01rv_02_u:177: RV_02.011.01.2{03} imā hi tvāmūrjo vardhayanti vasūyavaḥ sindhavo na kṣarantaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:178: RV_02.011.02.1{03} sṛjo mahīrindra yā apinvaḥ pariṣṭhitā ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_02_u:180: RV_02.011.03.1{03} uktheṣvin nu śūra yeṣu cākan stomeṣvindra rudriyeṣu ca
GV01rv_02_u:181: RV_02.011.03.2{03} tubhyedetā yāsu mandasānaḥ pra vāyave sisrate na śubhrāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:182: RV_02.011.04.1{03} śubhraṃ nu te śuṣmaṃ vardhayantaḥ śubhraṃ vajraṃ bāhvordadhānāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:183: RV_02.011.04.2{03} śubhrastvamindra vāvṛdhāno asme dāsīrviśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:184: RV_02.011.05.1{03} guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷhamapsvapīvṛtaṃ māyinaṃ kṣiyantam
GV01rv_02_u:185: RV_02.011.05.2{03} uto apo dyāṃ tastabhvāṃsamahannahiṃ śūra vīryeṇa
GV01rv_02_u:186: RV_02.011.06.1{04} stavā nu ta indra pūrvyā mahānyuta stavāma nūtanā kṛtāni
GV01rv_02_u:187: RV_02.011.06.2{04} stavā vajraṃ bāhvoruśantaṃ stavā harī sūryasya ketū
GV01rv_02_u:188: RV_02.011.07.1{04} harī nu ta indra vājayantā ghṛtaścutaṃ svāramasvārṣṭām
GV01rv_02_u:189: RV_02.011.07.2{04} vi samanā bhūmiraprathiṣṭāraṃsta parvataścit sariṣyan
GV01rv_02_u:190: RV_02.011.08.1{04} ni parvataḥ sādyaprayuchan saṃ mātṛbhirvāvaśāno akrān
GV01rv_02_u:191: RV_02.011.08.2{04} dūre pāre vāṇīṃ vardhayanta indreṣitāṃ dhamaniṃ paprathan ni
GV01rv_02_u:192: RV_02.011.09.1{04} indro mahāṃ sindhumāśayānaṃ māyāvinaṃ vṛtramasphuran niḥ
GV01rv_02_u:193: RV_02.011.09.2{04} arejetāṃ rodasī bhiyāne kanikradato vṛṣṇo asya vajrāt
GV01rv_02_u:194: RV_02.011.10.1{04} aroravīd vṛṣṇo asya vajro 'mānuṣaṃ yan mānuṣo nijūrvāt
GV01rv_02_u:195: RV_02.011.10.2{04} ni māyino dānavasya māyā apādayat papivān sutasya
GV01rv_02_u:196: RV_02.011.11.1{05} pibā-pibedindra śūra somaṃ mandantu tvā mandinaḥ sutāsaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:197: RV_02.011.11.2{05} pṛṇantaste kukṣī vardhayantvitthā sutaḥ paura indramāva
GV01rv_02_u:198: RV_02.011.12.1{05} tve indrāpyabhūma viprā dhiyaṃ vanema ṛtayā sapantaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:199: RV_02.011.12.2{05} avasyavo dhīmahi praśastiṃ sadyaste rāyo dāvane syāma
GV01rv_02_u:200: RV_02.011.13.1{05} syāma te ta indra ye ta ūtī avasyava ūrjaṃ vardhayantaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:201: RV_02.011.13.2{05} śuṣmintamaṃ yaṃ cākanāma devāsme rayiṃ rāsi vīravantam
GV01rv_02_u:202: RV_02.011.14.1{05} rāsi kṣayaṃ rāsi mitramasme rāsi śardha indra mārutaṃnaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:203: RV_02.011.14.2{05} sajoṣaso ye ca mandasānāḥ pra vāyavaḥ pāntyagraṇītim
GV01rv_02_u:204: RV_02.011.15.1{05} vyantvin nu yeṣu mandasānastṛpat somaṃ pāhi drahyadindra
GV01rv_02_u:205: RV_02.011.15.2{05} asmān su pṛtsvā tarutrāvardhayo dyāṃ bṛhadbhirarkaiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:206: RV_02.011.16.1{06} bṛhanta in nu ye te tarutrokthebhirvā sumnamāvivāsān
GV01rv_02_u:207: RV_02.011.16.2{06} stṛṇānāso barhiḥ pastyāvat tvotā idindra vājamagman
GV01rv_02_u:208: RV_02.011.17.1{06} ugreṣvin nu śūra mandasānastrikadrukeṣu pāhi somamindra
GV01rv_02_u:209: RV_02.011.17.2{06} pradodhuvacchmaśruṣu prīṇāno yāhi haribhyāṃ sutasyapītim
GV01rv_02_u:210: RV_02.011.18.1{06} dhiṣvā śavaḥ śūra yena vṛtramavābhinad dānumaurṇavābham
GV01rv_02_u:211: RV_02.011.18.2{06} apāvṛṇorjyotirāryāya ni savyataḥ sādi dasyurindra
GV01rv_02_u:212: RV_02.011.19.1{06} sanema ye ta ūtibhistaranto viśvā spṛdha āryeṇa dasyūn
GV01rv_02_u:213: RV_02.011.19.2{06} asmabhyaṃ tat tvāṣṭraṃ viśvarūpamarandhayaḥ sākhyasya tritāya
GV01rv_02_u:214: RV_02.011.20.1{06} asya suvānasya mandinastritasya nyarbudaṃ vāvṛdhāno astaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:215: RV_02.011.20.2{06} avartayat sūryo na cakraṃ bhinad valamindro aṅgirasvān
GV01rv_02_u:216: RV_02.011.21.1{06} nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyadindra dakṣiṇā maghonī
GV01rv_02_u:217: RV_02.011.21.2{06} śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema v. s.
GV01rv_02_u:218: RV_02.012.01.1{07} yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān devo devān kratunā paryabhūṣat
GV01rv_02_u:219: RV_02.012.01.2{07} yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:220: RV_02.012.02.1{07} yaḥ pṛthivīṃ vyathamānāmadṛṃhad yaḥ parvatān prakupitānaramṇāt
GV01rv_02_u:221: RV_02.012.02.2{07} yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyo yo dyāmastabhnāt sa janāsa indraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:222: RV_02.012.03.1{07} yo hatvāhimariṇāt sapta sindhūn yo gā udājadapadhā valasya
GV01rv_02_u:223: RV_02.012.03.2{07} yo aśmanorantaragniṃ jajāna saṃvṛk samatsu s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:224: RV_02.012.04.1{07} yenemā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yo dāsaṃ varṇamadharaṃguhākaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:225: RV_02.012.04.2{07} śvaghnīva yo jigīvān lakṣamādadaryaḥ puṣṭāni s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:226: RV_02.012.05.1{07} yaṃ smā pṛchanti kuha seti ghoramutemāhurnaiṣo astītyenam
GV01rv_02_u:227: RV_02.012.05.2{07} so aryaḥ puṣtīrvija ivā mināti śradasmai dhattas. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:228: RV_02.012.06.1{08} yo radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yo brahmaṇo nādhamānasyakīreḥ
GV01rv_02_u:229: RV_02.012.06.2{08} yuktagrāvṇo yo 'vitā suśipraḥ sutasomasya s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:230: RV_02.012.07.1{08} yasyāśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvo yasya grāmā yasya viśve rathāsaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:231: RV_02.012.07.2{08} yaḥ sūryaṃ ya uṣasaṃ jajāna yo apāṃ netā s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:232: RV_02.012.08.1{08} yaṃ krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare 'vara ubhayā amitrāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:233: RV_02.012.08.2{08} samānaṃ cid rathamātasthivāṃsā nānā havete s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:234: RV_02.012.09.1{08} yasmān na ṛte vijayante janāso yaṃ yudhyamānā avase havante
GV01rv_02_u:235: RV_02.012.09.2{08} yo viśvasya pratimānaṃ babhūva yo acyutacyut s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:236: RV_02.012.10.1{08} yaḥ śaśvato mahyeno dadhānānamanyamānāñcharvā jaghāna
GV01rv_02_u:237: RV_02.012.10.2{08} yaḥ śardhate nānudadāti śṛdhyāṃ yo dasyorhantās. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:238: RV_02.012.11.1{09} yaḥ śambaraṃ parvateṣu kṣiyantaṃ catvāriṃśyāṃ śaradyanvavindat
GV01rv_02_u:239: RV_02.012.11.2{09} ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna dānuṃ śayānaṃs. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:241: RV_02.012.12.2{09} yo rauhiṇamasphurad vajrabāhurdyāmārohantaṃs. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:242: RV_02.012.13.1{09} dyāvā cidasmai pṛthivī namete śuṣmāccidasya parvatā bhayante
GV01rv_02_u:243: RV_02.012.13.2{09} yaḥ somapā nicito vajrabāhuryo vajrahastaḥ s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:244: RV_02.012.14.1{09} yaḥ sunvantamavati yaḥ pacantaṃ yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānamūtī
GV01rv_02_u:245: RV_02.012.14.2{09} yasya brahma vardhanaṃ yasya somo yasyedaṃ rādhaḥ s. j. i.
GV01rv_02_u:246: RV_02.012.15.1{09} yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhra ā cid vājaṃ dardarṣi sa kilāsi satyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:247: RV_02.012.15.2{09} vayaṃ ta indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidathamā vadema
GV01rv_02_u:248: RV_02.013.01.1{10} ṛturjanitrī tasyā apas pari makṣū jāta āviśad yāsu vardhate
GV01rv_02_u:249: RV_02.013.01.2{10} tadāhanā abhavat pipyuṣī payo 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣaṃ prathamaṃ tadukthyam
GV01rv_02_u:250: RV_02.013.02.1{10} sadhrīmā yanti pari bibhratīḥ payo viśvapsnyāya pra bharanta bhojanam
GV01rv_02_u:251: RV_02.013.02.2{10} samāno adhvā pravatāmanuṣyade yastākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ sāsyukthyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:252: RV_02.013.03.1{10} anveko vadati yad dadāti tad rūpā minan tadapā eka īyate
GV01rv_02_u:254: RV_02.013.04.1{10} prajābhyaḥ puṣṭiṃ vibhajanta āsate rayimiva pṛṣṭhaṃ prabhavantamāyate
GV01rv_02_u:255: RV_02.013.04.2{10} asinvan daṃṣṭraiḥ pituratti bhojanaṃ yastākṛ...
GV01rv_02_u:256: RV_02.013.05.1{10} adhākṛṇoḥ pṛthivīṃ sandṛśe dive yo dhautīnāmahihannāriṇak pathaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:257: RV_02.013.05.2{10} taṃ tvā stomebhirudabhirna vājinaṃ devaṃ devā ajanan sāsyukthyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:258: RV_02.013.06.1{11} yo bhojanaṃ ca dayase ca vardhanamārdrādā śuṣkaṃ madhumad dudohitha
GV01rv_02_u:259: RV_02.013.06.2{11} sa śevadhiṃ ni dadhiṣe vivasvati viśvasyaika īśiṣe sāsyu.
GV01rv_02_u:260: RV_02.013.07.1{11} yaḥ puṣpiṇīśca prasvaśca dharmaṇādhi dāne vyavanīradhārayaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:261: RV_02.013.07.2{11} yaścāsamā ajano didyuto diva ururūrvānabhitaḥ s. u.
GV01rv_02_u:262: RV_02.013.08.1{11} yo nārmaraṃ sahavasuṃ nihantave pṛkṣāya ca dāsaveśāya cāvahaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:264: RV_02.013.09.1{11} śataṃ vā yasya daśa sākamādya ekasya śruṣṭau yad dhacodamāvitha
GV01rv_02_u:265: RV_02.013.09.2{11} arajjau dasyūn samunab dabhītaye suprāvyoabhavaḥ s. u.
GV01rv_02_u:266: RV_02.013.10.1{11} viśvedanu rodhanā asya pauṃsyaṃ dadurasmai dadhire kṛtnave dhanam
GV01rv_02_u:267: RV_02.013.10.2{11} ṣaḷ astabhnā viṣṭiraḥ pañca sandṛśaḥ pariparo abhavaḥ s. u.
GV01rv_02_u:268: RV_02.013.11.1{12} supravācanaṃ tava vīra vīryaṃ yadekena kratunā vindase vasu
GV01rv_02_u:269: RV_02.013.11.2{12} jātūṣṭhirasya pra vayaḥ sahasvato yā cakartha sendra viśvāsyukthyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:270: RV_02.013.12.1{12} aramayaḥ sarapasastarāya kaṃ turvītaye ca vayyāya ca srutim
GV01rv_02_u:271: RV_02.013.12.2{12} nīcā santamudanayaḥ parāvṛjaṃ prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ śravayan s. u.
GV01rv_02_u:272: RV_02.013.13.1{12} asmabhyaṃ tad vaso dānāya rādhaḥ samarthayasva bahu te vasavyam
GV01rv_02_u:273: RV_02.013.13.2{12} indra yaccitraṃ śravasyā anu dyūn bṛhad vadema v. s.
GV01rv_02_u:274: RV_02.014.01.1{13} adhvaryavo bharatendrāya somamāmatrebhiḥ siñcatā madyamandhaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:275: RV_02.014.01.2{13} kāmī hi vīraḥ sadamasya pītiṃ juhota vṛṣṇe tadideśa vaṣṭi
GV01rv_02_u:276: RV_02.014.02.1{13} adhvaryavo yo apo vavrivāṃsaṃ vṛtraṃ jaghānāśanyeva vṛkṣam
GV01rv_02_u:277: RV_02.014.02.2{13} tasmā etaṃ bharata tadvaśāyaneṣa indro arhati pītimasya
GV01rv_02_u:278: RV_02.014.03.1{13} adhvaryavo yo dṛbhīkaṃ jaghāna yo gā udājadapa hi valaṃ vaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:279: RV_02.014.03.2{13} tasmā etamantarikṣe na vātamindraṃ somairorṇuta jūrna vastraiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:280: RV_02.014.04.1{13} adhvaryavo ya uraṇaṃ jaghāna nava cakhvāṃsaṃ navatiṃ cabāhūn
GV01rv_02_u:281: RV_02.014.04.2{13} yo arbudamava nīcā babādhe tamindraṃ somasyabhṛthe hinota
GV01rv_02_u:282: RV_02.014.05.1{13} adhvaryavo yaḥ svaśnaṃ jaghāna yaḥ śuṣṇamaśuṣaṃ yo vyaṃsam
GV01rv_02_u:283: RV_02.014.05.2{13} yaḥ pipruṃ namuciṃ yo rudhikrāṃ tasmā indrāyāndhaso juhota
GV01rv_02_u:284: RV_02.014.06.1{13} adhvaryavo yaḥ śataṃ śambarasya puro bibhedāśmaneva pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_02_u:285: RV_02.014.06.2{13} yo varcinaḥ śatamindraḥ sahasramapāvapad bharatāsomamasmai
GV01rv_02_u:286: RV_02.014.07.1{14} adhvaryavo yaḥ śatamā sahasraṃ bhūmyā upasthe 'vapajjaghanvān
GV01rv_02_u:287: RV_02.014.07.2{14} kutsasyāyoratithigvasya vīrān nyāvṛṇag bharatā somamasmai
GV01rv_02_u:288: RV_02.014.08.1{14} adhvaryavo yan naraḥ kāmayādhve śruṣṭī vahanto naśathā tadindre
GV01rv_02_u:289: RV_02.014.08.2{14} gabhastipūtaṃ bharata śrutāyendrāya somaṃ yajyavo juhota
GV01rv_02_u:290: RV_02.014.09.1{14} adhvaryavaḥ kartanā śruṣṭimasmai vane nipūtaṃ vana un nayadhvam
GV01rv_02_u:291: RV_02.014.09.2{14} juṣāṇo hastyamabhi vāvaśe va indrāya somaṃ madiraṃ juhota
GV01rv_02_u:292: RV_02.014.10.1{14} adhvaryavaḥ payasodharyathā goḥ somebhirīṃ pṛṇatā bhojamindram
GV01rv_02_u:293: RV_02.014.10.2{14} vedāhamasya nibhṛtaṃ ma etad ditsantaṃ bhūyo yajataściketa
GV01rv_02_u:294: RV_02.014.11.1{14} adhvaryavo yo divyasya vasvo yaḥ pārthivasya kṣamyasya rājā
GV01rv_02_u:295: RV_02.014.11.2{14} tamūrdaraṃ na priṇatā yavenendraṃ somebhistadapovo astu
GV01rv_02_u:297: RV_02.015.01.1{15} pra ghā nvasya mahato mahāni satyā satyasya karaṇāni vocam
GV01rv_02_u:298: RV_02.015.01.2{15} trikadrukeśvapibat sutasyāsya made ahimindro jaghāna
GV01rv_02_u:299: RV_02.015.02.1{15} avaṃśe dyāmastabhāyad bṛhantamā rodasī apṛṇadantarikṣam
GV01rv_02_u:300: RV_02.015.02.2{15} sa dhārayad pṛthivīṃ paprathacca somasya tā mada indraścakāra
GV01rv_02_u:301: RV_02.015.03.1{15} sadmeva prāco vi mimāya mānairvajreṇa khānyatṛṇan nadīnām
GV01rv_02_u:303: RV_02.015.04.1{15} sa pravoḷhṝn parigatyā dabhīterviśvamadhāgāyudhamiddhe agnau
GV01rv_02_u:305: RV_02.015.05.1{15} sa īṃ mahīṃ dhunimetoraramṇāt so asnātṝnapārayat svasti
GV01rv_02_u:306: RV_02.015.05.2{15} ta utsnāya rayimabhi pra tasthuḥ so...
GV01rv_02_u:307: RV_02.015.06.1{16} sodañcaṃ sindhumariṇān mahitvā vajreṇāna uṣasaḥ saṃ pipeṣa
GV01rv_02_u:310: RV_02.015.07.2{16} prati śroṇa sthād vyanagacaṣṭa so...
GV01rv_02_u:311: RV_02.015.08.1{16} bhinad valamaṅgirobhirgṛṇāno vi parvatasya dṛṃhitānyairat
GV01rv_02_u:313: RV_02.015.09.1{16} svapnenābhyupyā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca jaghantha dasyaṃ pra dabhītimāvaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:314: RV_02.015.09.2{16} rambhī cidatra vivide hiraṇyaṃ so...
GV01rv_02_u:316: RV_02.016.01.1{17} pra vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamāya suṣṭutimagnāviva samidhāne havirbhare
GV01rv_02_u:317: RV_02.016.01.2{17} indramajuryaṃ jarayantamukṣitaṃ sanād yuvānamavase havāmahe
GV01rv_02_u:318: RV_02.016.02.1{17} yasmādindrād bṛhataḥ kiṃ caneṃ ṛte viśvānyasmin sambhṛtādhi vīryā
GV01rv_02_u:319: RV_02.016.02.2{17} jaṭhare somaṃ tanvī saho maho haste vajraṃ bharati śīrṣaṇi kratum
GV01rv_02_u:320: RV_02.016.03.1{17} na kṣoṇībhyāṃ paribhve ta indriyaṃ na samudraiḥ parvatairindra te rathaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:321: RV_02.016.03.2{17} na te vajramanvaśnoti kaścana yadāśubhiḥ patasi yojanā puru
GV01rv_02_u:322: RV_02.016.04.1{17} viśve hyasmai yajatāya dhṛṣṇave kratuṃ bharanti vṛṣabhāya saścate
GV01rv_02_u:323: RV_02.016.04.2{17} vṛṣā yajasva haviṣā viduṣṭaraḥ pibendra somaṃ vṛṣabheṇa bhānunā
GV01rv_02_u:324: RV_02.016.05.1{17} vṛṣṇaḥ kośaḥ pavate madhva ūrmirvṛṣabhānnāya vṛṣabhāya pātave
GV01rv_02_u:325: RV_02.016.05.2{17} vṛṣaṇādhvaryū vṛṣabhāso adrayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somaṃ vṛṣabhāya suṣvati
GV01rv_02_u:326: RV_02.016.06.1{18} vṛṣā te vajra uta te vṛṣā ratho vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣabhāṇyāyudhā
GV01rv_02_u:327: RV_02.016.06.2{18} vṛṣṇo madasya vṛṣabha tvamīśiṣa indra somasya vṛṣabhasya tṛpṇuhi
GV01rv_02_u:328: RV_02.016.07.1{18} pra te nāvaṃ na samane vacasyuvaṃ brahmaṇā yāmi savaneṣudādhṛṣiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:329: RV_02.016.07.2{18} kuvin no asya vacaso nibodhiṣadindramutsaṃ na vasunaḥ sicāmahe
GV01rv_02_u:330: RV_02.016.08.1{18} purā sambādhādabhyā vavṛtsva no dhenurna vatsaṃ yavasasya pipyuṣī
GV01rv_02_u:331: RV_02.016.08.2{18} sakṛt su te sumatibhiḥ śatakrato saṃ patnībhirna vṛṣaṇo nasīmahi
GV01rv_02_u:333: RV_02.017.01.1{19} tadasmai navyamaṅgirasvadarcata śuṣmā yadasya pratnathodīrate
GV01rv_02_u:334: RV_02.017.01.2{19} viśvā yad gotrā sahasā parīvṛtā made somasya dṛṃhitānyairayat
GV01rv_02_u:335: RV_02.017.02.1{19} sa bhutu yo ha prathamāya dhāyasa ojo mimāno mahimānamātirat
GV01rv_02_u:336: RV_02.017.02.2{19} śūro yo yutsu tanvaṃ parivyata śīrṣaṇi dyāṃ mahinā pratyamuñcata
GV01rv_02_u:337: RV_02.017.03.1{19} adhākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ vīryaṃ mahad yadasyāgre brahmaṇā śuṣmamairayaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:338: RV_02.017.03.2{19} ratheṣṭhena haryaśvena vicyutāḥ pra jīrayaḥ sisrate sadhryak pṛthak
GV01rv_02_u:339: RV_02.017.04.1{19} adhā yo viśvā bhuvanābhi majmaneśānakṛt pravayā abhyavardhata
GV01rv_02_u:340: RV_02.017.04.2{19} ād rodasī jyotiṣā vahnirātanot sīvyan tamāṃsi dudhitā samavyayat
GV01rv_02_u:342: RV_02.017.05.2{19} adhārayat pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyasamastabhnān māyayā dyāmavasrasaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:343: RV_02.017.06.1{20} sāsmā araṃ bāhubhyāṃ yaṃ pitākṛṇod viśvasmādā januṣo vedasas pari
GV01rv_02_u:344: RV_02.017.06.2{20} yenā pṛthivyāṃ ni kriviṃ śayadhyai vajreṇa hatvyavṛṇak tuviṣvaṇiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:345: RV_02.017.07.1{20} amājūriva pitroḥ sacā satī samānādā sadasastvāmiye bhagam
GV01rv_02_u:346: RV_02.017.07.2{20} kṛdhi praketamupa māsyā bhara daddhi bhāgaṃ tanvo yena māmahaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:347: RV_02.017.08.1{20} bhojaṃ tvāmindra vayaṃ huvema dadiṣ ṭvamindrāpāṃsi vājān
GV01rv_02_u:348: RV_02.017.08.2{20} aviḍḍhīndra citrayā na ūti kṛdhi vṛśannindra vasyaso naḥ
GV01rv_02_u:350: RV_02.018.01.1{21} prātā ratho navo yoji sasniścaturyugastrikaśaḥ saptaraśmiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:351: RV_02.018.01.2{21} daśāritro manuṣyaḥ svarṣāḥ sa iṣṭibhirmatibhīraṃhyo bhūt
GV01rv_02_u:352: RV_02.018.02.1{21} sāsmā araṃ prathamaṃ sa dvitīyamuto tṛtīyaṃ manuṣaḥ sa hotā
GV01rv_02_u:353: RV_02.018.02.2{21} anyasyā garbhamanya ū jananta so anyebhiḥ sacate jenyo vṛṣā
GV01rv_02_u:354: RV_02.018.03.1{21} harī nu kaṃ ratha indrasya yojamāyai sūktena vacasā navena
GV01rv_02_u:355: RV_02.018.03.2{21} mo ṣu tvāmatra bahavo hi viprā ni rīraman yajamānāso anye
GV01rv_02_u:356: RV_02.018.04.1{21} ā dvābhyāṃ haribhyāmindra yāhyā caturbhirā ṣaḍbhirhūyamānaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:357: RV_02.018.04.2{21} āṣṭābhirdaśabhiḥ somapeyamayaṃ sutaḥsumakha mā mṛdhas kaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:358: RV_02.018.05.1{21} ā viṃśatyā triṃśatā yāhyarvāṃ ā catvāriṃśatā haribhiryajānaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:359: RV_02.018.05.2{21} ā pañcāśatā surathebhirindrā ṣaṣṭyā saptatyā somapeyam
GV01rv_02_u:360: RV_02.018.06.1{22} āśītyā navatyā yāhyarvāṃ ā śatena haribhiruhyamānaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:361: RV_02.018.06.2{22} ayaṃ hi te śunahotreṣu soma indra tvāyā pariṣikto madāya
GV01rv_02_u:362: RV_02.018.07.1{22} mama brahmendra yāhyachā viśvā harī dhuri dhiṣvā rathasya
GV01rv_02_u:363: RV_02.018.07.2{22} purutrā hi vihavyo babhūthāsmiñchūra savane mādayasva
GV01rv_02_u:364: RV_02.018.08.1{22} na ma indreṇa sakhyaṃ vi yoṣadasmabhyamasya dakṣiṇā duhīta
GV01rv_02_u:365: RV_02.018.08.2{22} upa jyeṣṭhe varūthe gabhastau prāye-prāye jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma
GV01rv_02_u:367: RV_02.019.01.1{23} apāyyasyāndhaso madāya manīṣiṇaḥ suvānasya prayasaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:368: RV_02.019.01.2{23} yasminnindraḥ pradivi vāvṛdhāna oko dadhe brahmaṇyantaśca naraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:369: RV_02.019.02.1{23} asya mandāno madhvo vajrahasto 'himindro arṇovṛtaṃ vi vṛścat
GV01rv_02_u:370: RV_02.019.02.2{23} pra yad vayo sa svasarāṇyachā prayāṃsi ca nadīnāṃ cakramanta
GV01rv_02_u:371: RV_02.019.03.1{23} sa māhina indro arṇo apāṃ prairayadahihāchā samudram
GV01rv_02_u:372: RV_02.019.03.2{23} ajanayat sūryaṃ vidad gā aktunāhnāṃ vayunāni sādhat
GV01rv_02_u:373: RV_02.019.04.1{23} so apratīni manave purūṇīndro dāśad dāśuṣe hanti vṛtram
GV01rv_02_u:374: RV_02.019.04.2{23} sadyo yo nṛbhyo atasāyyo bhūt paspṛdhānebhyaḥ sūryasya sātau
GV01rv_02_u:375: RV_02.019.05.1{23} sa sunvata indraḥ sūryamā devo riṇaṃ martyāya stavān
GV01rv_02_u:376: RV_02.019.05.2{23} ā yad rayiṃ guhadavadyamasmai bharadaṃśaṃ naitaśo daśasyan
GV01rv_02_u:377: RV_02.019.06.1{24} sa randhayat sadivaḥ sārathaye śuṣṇamaśuṣaṃ kuyavaṃ kutsāya
GV01rv_02_u:378: RV_02.019.06.2{24} divodāsāya navatiṃ ca navendraḥ puro vyairacchambarasya
GV01rv_02_u:379: RV_02.019.07.1{24} evā ta indrocathamahema śravasyā na tmanā vājayantaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:380: RV_02.019.07.2{24} aśyāma tat sāptamāśuṣāṇā nanamo vadharadevasya pīyoḥ
GV01rv_02_u:381: RV_02.019.08.1{24} evā te gṛtsamadāḥ śūra mamnāvasyavo na vayunāni takṣuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:382: RV_02.019.08.2{24} brahmaṇyanta indra te navīya iṣamūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ sumnamaśyuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:384: RV_02.020.01.1{25} vayaṃ te vaya indra viddhi ṣu ṇaḥ pra bharāmahe vājayurna ratham
GV01rv_02_u:385: RV_02.020.01.2{25} vipanyavo dīdhyato manīṣā sumnamiyakṣantastvāvato nṝn
GV01rv_02_u:386: RV_02.020.02.1{25} tvaṃ na indra tvābhirūtī tvāyato abhiṣṭipāsi janān
GV01rv_02_u:387: RV_02.020.02.2{25} tvamino dāśuṣo varūtetthādhīrabhi yo nakṣati tvā
GV01rv_02_u:388: RV_02.020.03.1{25} sa no yuvendro johūtraḥ sakhā śivo narāmastu pātā
GV01rv_02_u:389: RV_02.020.03.2{25} yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānamūtī pacantaṃ ca stuvantaṃca praṇeṣat
GV01rv_02_u:390: RV_02.020.04.1{25} tamu stuṣa indraṃ taṃ gṛṇīṣe yasmin purā vāvṛdhuḥ śāśaduśca
GV01rv_02_u:391: RV_02.020.04.2{25} sa vasvaḥ kāmaṃ pīparadiyāno brahmaṇyato nūtanasyāyoḥ
GV01rv_02_u:392: RV_02.020.05.1{25} so aṅgirasāmucathā jujuṣvān brahmā tūtodindro gātumiṣṇan
GV01rv_02_u:393: RV_02.020.05.2{25} muṣṇannuṣasaḥ sūryeṇa stavānaśnasya cicchiśnathat pūrvyāṇi
GV01rv_02_u:394: RV_02.020.06.1{26} sa ha śruta indro nāma deva ūrdhvo bhuvan manuṣe dasmatamaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:395: RV_02.020.06.2{26} ava priyamarśasānasya sāhvāñchiro bharad dāsasya svadhāvān
GV01rv_02_u:396: RV_02.020.07.1{26} sa vṛtrahendraḥ kṛṣṇayonīḥ purandaro dāsīrairayad vi
GV01rv_02_u:397: RV_02.020.07.2{26} ajanayan manave kṣāmapaśca satrā śaṃsaṃ yajamānasya tūtot
GV01rv_02_u:398: RV_02.020.08.1{26} tasmai tavasyamanu dāyi satrendrāya devebhirarṇasātau
GV01rv_02_u:399: RV_02.020.08.2{26} prati yadasya vajraṃ bāhvordhurhatvī dasyūn pura āyasīrni tārīt
GV01rv_02_u:401: RV_02.021.01.1{27} viśvajite dhanajite svarjite satrājite nṛjita urvarājite
GV01rv_02_u:402: RV_02.021.01.2{27} aśvajite gojite abjite bharendrāya somaṃ yajatāya haryatam
GV01rv_02_u:404: RV_02.021.02.2{27} tuvigraye vahnaye duṣṭarītave satrāsāhe nama indrāya vocata
GV01rv_02_u:405: RV_02.021.03.1{27} satrāsāho janabhakṣo janaṃsahaścyavano yudhmo anu joṣamukṣitaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:406: RV_02.021.03.2{27} vṛtaṃcayaḥ sahurirvikṣvārita indrasya vocaṃ pra kṛtāni vīryā
GV01rv_02_u:407: RV_02.021.04.1{27} anānudo vṛṣabho dodhato vadho gambhīra ṛṣvo asamaṣṭakāvyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:408: RV_02.021.04.2{27} radhracodaḥ śnathano vīḷitas pṛthurindraḥ suyajña uṣasaḥ svarjanat
GV01rv_02_u:409: RV_02.021.05.1{27} yajṇena gātumapturo vividrire dhiyo hinvānā uśijo manīṣiṇaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:410: RV_02.021.05.2{27} abhisvarā niṣadā gā avasyava indre hinvānā draviṇānyāśata
GV01rv_02_u:411: RV_02.021.06.1{27} indra śreṣṭhāni draviṇāni dhehi cittiṃ dakṣasya subhagatvaṃ asme
GV01rv_02_u:412: RV_02.021.06.2{27} poṣaṃ rayīṇāmariṣṭiṃ tanūnāṃ svādmānaṃ vācaḥ sudinatvamahnām
GV01rv_02_u:413: RV_02.022.01.1{28} trikadrukeṣu mahiṣo yavāśiraṃ tuviśuṣmastṛpat somamapibad viṣṇunā sutaṃ yathāvaśat
GV01rv_02_u:414: RV_02.022.01.2{28} sa īṃ mamāda mahi karma kartave mahāmuruṃ sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyamindraṃsatya induḥ
GV01rv_02_u:415: RV_02.022.02.1{28} adha tviṣīmānabhyojasā kriviṃ yudhābhavadā rodasī apṛṇadasya majmanā pra vāvṛdhe
GV01rv_02_u:417: RV_02.022.03.1{28} sākaṃ jātaḥ kratunā sākamojasā vavakṣitha sākaṃ vṛddho vīryaiḥ sāsahirmṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:418: RV_02.022.03.2{28} dātā rādhaḥ stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sainaṃ ...
GV01rv_02_u:419: RV_02.022.04.1{28} tava tyan naryaṃ nṛto 'pa indra prathamaṃ pūrvyaṃ divi pravācyaṃ kṛtam /
GV01rv_02_u:420: yad devasya śavasā prāriṇā asuṃ riṇannapaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:422: RV_02.023.01.1{29} gaṇānāṃ tvā gaṇapatiṃ havāmahe kaviṃ kavīnāmupamaśravastamam
GV01rv_02_u:423: RV_02.023.01.2{29} jyeṣṭharājaṃ brahmaṇāṃ brahmaṇas pata ā naḥ ṣṛṇvannūtibhiḥ sīda sādanam
GV01rv_02_u:424: RV_02.023.02.1{29} devāścit te asurya pracetaso bṛhaspate yajñiyaṃ bhāgamānaśuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:425: RV_02.023.02.2{29} usrā iva sūryo jyotiṣā maho viśveṣāmijjanitā brahmaṇāmasi
GV01rv_02_u:426: RV_02.023.03.1{29} ā vibādhyā parirāpastamāṃsi ca jyotiṣmantaṃ rathaṃ ṛtasya tiṣṭhasi
GV01rv_02_u:428: RV_02.023.04.1{29} sunītibhirnayasi trāyase janaṃ yastubhyaṃ dāśān na tamaṃho aśnavat
GV01rv_02_u:429: RV_02.023.04.2{29} brahmadviṣastapano manyumīrasi bṛhaspate mahi tat te mahitvanam
GV01rv_02_u:430: RV_02.023.05.1{29} na tamaṃho na duritaṃ kutaścana nārātayastitirurna dvayāvinaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:431: RV_02.023.05.2{29} viśvā idasmād dhvaraso vi bādhase yaṃ sugopā rakṣasi brahmaṇas pate
GV01rv_02_u:432: RV_02.023.06.1{30} tvaṃ no gopāḥ pathikṛd vicakṣaṇastava vratāya matibhirjarāmahe
GV01rv_02_u:433: RV_02.023.06.2{30} bṛhaspate yo no abhi hvaro dadhe svā taṃ marmartu duchunā harasvatī
GV01rv_02_u:434: RV_02.023.07.1{30} uta vā yo no marcayādanāgaso 'rātīvā martaḥ sānuko vṛkaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:435: RV_02.023.07.2{30} bṛhaspate apa taṃ vartayā pathaḥ sugaṃ no asyai devavītaye kṛdhi
GV01rv_02_u:437: RV_02.023.08.2{30} bṛhaspate devanido ni barhaya mā durevā uttaraṃ sumnamun naśan
GV01rv_02_u:438: RV_02.023.09.1{30} tvayā vayaṃ suvṛdhā brahmaṇas pate spārhā vasu manuṣyā dadīmahi
GV01rv_02_u:439: RV_02.023.09.2{30} yā no dūre taḷito yā arātayo 'bhi santi jambhayā tā anapnasaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:440: RV_02.023.10.1{30} tvayā vayamuttamaṃ dhīmahe vayo bṛhaspate papriṇā sasninā yujā
GV01rv_02_u:441: RV_02.023.10.2{30} mā no duḥśaṃso abhidipsurīśata pra suśaṃsā matibhistāriṣīmahi
GV01rv_02_u:442: RV_02.023.11.1{31} anānudo vṛṣabho jagmirāhavaṃ niṣṭaptā śatruṃ pṛtanāsusāsahiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:443: RV_02.023.11.2{31} asi satya ṛṇayā brahmaṇas pata ugrasya cid damitā vīḷuharṣiṇaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:444: RV_02.023.12.1{31} adevena manasā yo riśaṇyati śāsāmugro manyamāno jighāṃsati
GV01rv_02_u:445: RV_02.023.12.2{31} bṛhaspate ma praṇak tasya no vadho ni karma manyuṃ durevasya śardhataḥ
GV01rv_02_u:446: RV_02.023.13.1{31} bhareṣu havyo namasopasadyo gantā vājeṣu sanitā dhanaṃ dhanam
GV01rv_02_u:447: RV_02.023.13.2{31} viśvā idaryo abhidipsvo mṛdho bṛhaspatirvi vavarhā rathāṃ iva
GV01rv_02_u:448: RV_02.023.14.1{31} tejiṣthayā tapani rakṣasastapa ye tvā nide dadhire dṛṣṭavīryam
GV01rv_02_u:449: RV_02.023.14.2{31} āvistat kṛṣva yadasat ta ukthyaṃ bṛhaspate vi parirāpo ardaya
GV01rv_02_u:450: RV_02.023.15.1{31} bṛhaspate ati yadaryo arhād dyumad vibhāti kratumajjaneṣu
GV01rv_02_u:451: RV_02.023.15.2{31} yad dīdayacchavasa ṛtaprajāta tadasmasu draviṇaṃ dhehicitram
GV01rv_02_u:452: RV_02.023.16.1{32} mā na stenebhyo ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇo ripavo 'nneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:453: RV_02.023.16.2{32} ā devānāmohate vi vrayo hṛdi bṛhaspate naparaḥ sāmno viduḥ
GV01rv_02_u:454: RV_02.023.17.1{32} viśvebhyo hi tvā bhuvanebhyas pari tvaṣṭājanat sāmnaḥ sāmnaḥ kaviḥ
GV01rv_02_u:455: RV_02.023.17.2{32} sa ṛṇacid ṛṇayā brahmaṇas patirdruho hantā maha ṛtasya dhartari
GV01rv_02_u:456: RV_02.023.18.1{32} tava śriye vyajihīta parvato gavāṃ gotramudasṛjo yadaṅgiraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:457: RV_02.023.18.2{32} indreṇa yujā tamasā parīvṛtaṃ bṛhaspate nirapāmaubjo arṇavam
GV01rv_02_u:458: RV_02.023.19.1{32} brahmaṇas pate tvamasya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayaṃ ca jinva
GV01rv_02_u:459: RV_02.023.19.2{32} viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yadavanti devā bṛhad vadema ...
GV01rv_02_u:460: RV_02.024.01.1{01} semāmaviḍḍhi prabhṛtiṃ ya īśiṣe 'yā vidhema navayā mahā girā
GV01rv_02_u:461: RV_02.024.01.2{01} yathā no mīḍhvān stavate sakhā tava bṛhaspatesīṣadhaḥ sota no matim
GV01rv_02_u:462: RV_02.024.02.1{01} yo nantvānyanaman nyojasotādardarmanyunā śambarāṇi vi
GV01rv_02_u:463: RV_02.024.02.2{01} prācyāvayadacyutā brahmaṇas patirā cāviśad vasumantaṃ vi parvatam
GV01rv_02_u:464: RV_02.024.03.1{01} tad devānāṃ devatamāya kartvamaśrathnan dṛḷhāvradanta vīḷitā
GV01rv_02_u:465: RV_02.024.03.2{01} ud gā ājadabhinad brahmaṇā valamagūhat tamo vyacakṣayat svaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:467: RV_02.024.04.2{01} tameva viśve papire svardṛśo bahu sākaṃ sisicurutsamudriṇam
GV01rv_02_u:468: RV_02.024.05.1{01} sanā tā kā cid bhuvanā bhavītvā mādbhiḥ śaradbhirduro varanta vaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:469: RV_02.024.05.2{01} ayatantā carato anyad-anyadid ya cakāra vayunā brahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:470: RV_02.024.06.1{02} abhinakṣanto abhi ye tamānaśurnidhiṃ paṇīnāṃ paramaṃguhā hitam
GV01rv_02_u:471: RV_02.024.06.2{02} te vidvāṃsaḥ praticakṣyānṛtā punaryata uāyan tadudīyurāviśam
GV01rv_02_u:472: RV_02.024.07.1{02} ṛtāvānaḥ praticakṣyānṛtā punarāta ā tasthuḥ kavayo mahas pathaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:473: RV_02.024.07.2{02} te bāhubhyāṃ dhamitamagnimaśmani nakiḥ ṣo astyaraṇo jahurhi tam
GV01rv_02_u:474: RV_02.024.08.1{02} ṛtajyena kṣipreṇa brahmaṇas patiryatra vaṣṭi pra tadaśnoti dhanvanā
GV01rv_02_u:475: RV_02.024.08.2{02} tasya sādhvīriṣavo yābhirasyati nṛcakṣaso dṛśaye karṇayonayaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:476: RV_02.024.09.1{02} sa saṃnayaḥ sa vinayaḥ purohitaḥ sa suṣṭutaḥ sa yudhibrahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:477: RV_02.024.09.2{02} cākṣmo yad vājaṃ bharate matī dhanādit sūryastapati tapyaturvṛthā
GV01rv_02_u:478: RV_02.024.10.1{02} vibhu prabhu prathamaṃ mehanāvato bṛhaspateḥ suvidatrāṇi rādhyā
GV01rv_02_u:479: RV_02.024.10.2{02} imā sātāni venyasya vājino yena janā ubhaye bhuñjate viśaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:480: RV_02.024.11.1{03} yo 'vare vṛjane viśvathā vibhurmahāmu raṇvaḥ śavasā vavakṣitha
GV01rv_02_u:481: RV_02.024.11.2{03} sa devo devān prati paprathe pṛthu viśvedu tāparibhūrbrahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:482: RV_02.024.12.1{03} viśvaṃ satyaṃ maghavānā yuvoridāpaścana pra minanti vrataṃ vām
GV01rv_02_u:483: RV_02.024.12.2{03} achendrābrahmaṇaspatī havirno 'nnaṃ yujeva vājinā jigātam
GV01rv_02_u:484: RV_02.024.13.1{03} utāśiṣṭhā anu śṛṇvanti vahnayaḥ sabheyo vipro bharate matī dhanā
GV01rv_02_u:485: RV_02.024.13.2{03} vīḷudveṣā anu vaśa ṛṇamādadiḥ sa ha vājī samithe brahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:486: RV_02.024.14.1{03} brahmaṇas paterabhavad yathāvaśaṃ satyo manyurmahi karmākariṣyataḥ
GV01rv_02_u:487: RV_02.024.14.2{03} yo gā udājat sa dive vi cābhajan mahīva rītiḥ śavasāsarat pṛthak
GV01rv_02_u:488: RV_02.024.15.1{03} brahmaṇas pate suyamasya viśvahā rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ
GV01rv_02_u:489: RV_02.024.15.2{03} vīreṣu vīrānupa pṛṃdhi nastvaṃ yadīśāno brahmaṇā veṣi me havam
GV01rv_02_u:491: RV_02.025.01.1{04} indhāno agniṃ vanavad vanuṣyataḥ kṛtabrahmā śūśuvad rātahavya it
GV01rv_02_u:492: RV_02.025.01.2{04} jātena jātamati sa pra sarsṛte yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃkṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:493: RV_02.025.02.1{04} vīrebhirvīrān vanavad vanuṣyato gobhī rayiṃ paprathad bodhati tmanā
GV01rv_02_u:494: RV_02.025.02.2{04} tokaṃ ca tasya tanayaṃ ca vardhate yaṃ-yaṃ ...
GV01rv_02_u:495: RV_02.025.03.1{04} sindhurna kṣodaḥ śimīvān ṛghāyato vṛṣeva vadhrīnrabhi vaṣṭyojasā
GV01rv_02_u:497: RV_02.025.04.1{04} tasmā arṣanti divyā asaścataḥ sa satvabhiḥ prathamo goṣugachati
GV01rv_02_u:499: RV_02.025.05.1{04} tasmā id viśve dhunayanta sindhavo 'chidrā śarma dadhire purūṇi
GV01rv_02_u:500: RV_02.025.05.2{04} devānāṃ sumne subhagaḥ sa edhate yaṃ-yaṃ ...
GV01rv_02_u:502: RV_02.026.01.2{05} suprāvīrid vanavat pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ yajvedayajyorvi bhajāti bhojanam
GV01rv_02_u:503: RV_02.026.02.1{05} yajasva vīra pra vihi manāyato bhadraṃ manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye
GV01rv_02_u:504: RV_02.026.02.2{05} haviṣ kṛṇuṣva subhago yathāsasi brahmaṇas paterava ā vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_02_u:505: RV_02.026.03.1{05} sa ijjanena sa viśā sa janmanā sa putrairvājaṃ bharatedhanā nṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:506: RV_02.026.03.2{05} devānāṃ yaḥ pitaramāvivāsati śraddhāmanā haviṣā brahmaṇas patim
GV01rv_02_u:507: RV_02.026.04.1{05} yo asmai havyairghṛtavadbhiravidhat pra taṃ prācā nayati brahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:509: RV_02.027.01.1{06} imā gira ādityebhyo ghṛtasnūḥ sanād rājabhyo juhvā juhomi
GV01rv_02_u:510: RV_02.027.01.2{06} śṛṇotu mitro aryamā bhago nastuvijāto varuṇo dakṣo aṃśaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:511: RV_02.027.02.1{06} imaṃ stomaṃ sakratavo me adya mitro aryamā varuṇo juṣanta
GV01rv_02_u:512: RV_02.027.02.2{06} ādityāsaḥ śucayo dhārapūtā avṛjinā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:513: RV_02.027.03.1{06} ta ādityāsa uravo gabhīrā adabdhāso dipsanto bhūryakṣāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:514: RV_02.027.03.2{06} antaḥ paśyanti vṛjinota sādhu sarvaṃ rājabhyaḥ paramā cidanti
GV01rv_02_u:515: RV_02.027.04.1{06} dhārayanta ādityāso jagat sthā devā viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:516: RV_02.027.04.2{06} dīrghādhiyo rakṣamāṇā asuryaṃ ṛtāvānaścayamānā ṛṇāni
GV01rv_02_u:517: RV_02.027.05.1{06} vidyāmādityā avaso vo asya yadaryaman bhaya ā cin mayobhu
GV01rv_02_u:518: RV_02.027.05.2{06} yuṣmākaṃ mitrāvaruṇā praṇītau pari śvabhreva duritānivṛjyām
GV01rv_02_u:519: RV_02.027.06.1{07} sugo hi vo aryaman mitra panthā anṛkṣaro varuṇa sādhurasti
GV01rv_02_u:520: RV_02.027.06.2{07} tenādityā adhi vocatā no yachatā no duṣparihantu śarma
GV01rv_02_u:521: RV_02.027.07.1{07} pipartu no aditī rājaputrāti dveṣāṃsyaryamā sugebhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:522: RV_02.027.07.2{07} bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya śarmopa syāma puruvīrā ariṣṭāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:523: RV_02.027.08.1{07} tisro bhūmīrdhārayan trīnruta dyūn trīṇi vratā vidathe antareṣām
GV01rv_02_u:524: RV_02.027.08.2{07} ṛtenādityā mahi vo mahitvaṃ tadaryaman varuṇa mitra cāru
GV01rv_02_u:525: RV_02.027.09.1{07} trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta hiraṇyayāḥ śucayo dhārapūtāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:526: RV_02.027.09.2{07} asvapnajo animiṣā adabdhā uruśaṃsā ṛjave martyāya
GV01rv_02_u:527: RV_02.027.10.1{07} tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsi rājā ye ca devā asura ye ca martāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:528: RV_02.027.10.2{07} śataṃ no rāsva śarado vicakṣe 'cyāmāyūṃṣi sudhitāni pūrvā
GV01rv_02_u:529: RV_02.027.11.1{08} na dakṣiṇā vi cikite na savyā na prācīnamādityā notapaścā
GV01rv_02_u:530: RV_02.027.11.2{08} pākyā cid vasavo dhīryā cid yuṣmānīto abhayaṃjyotiraśyām
GV01rv_02_u:531: RV_02.027.12.1{08} yo rājabhya ṛtanibhyo dadāśa yaṃ vardhayanti puṣṭayaścanityāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:532: RV_02.027.12.2{08} sa revān yāti prathamo rathena vasudāvā vidatheṣu praśastaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:533: RV_02.027.13.1{08} śucirapaḥ sūyavasā adabdha upa kṣeti vṛddhavayāḥ suvīraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:534: RV_02.027.13.2{08} nakiṣ ṭaṃ ghnantyantito na dūrād ya ādityānāṃ bhavati praṇītau
GV01rv_02_u:535: RV_02.027.14.1{08} adite mitra varuṇota mṛḷa yad vo vayaṃ cakṛmā kaccidāgaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:536: RV_02.027.14.2{08} urvaśyāmabhayaṃ jyotirindra mā no dīrghā abhi naśan tamisrāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:537: RV_02.027.15.1{08} ubhe asmai pīpayataḥ samīcī divo vṛṣṭiṃ subhago nāma puṣyan
GV01rv_02_u:538: RV_02.027.15.2{08} ubhā kṣayāvājayan yāti pṛtsūbhāvardhau bhavataḥ sādhū asmai
GV01rv_02_u:539: RV_02.027.16.1{08} yā vo māyā abhidruhe yajatrāḥ pāśā ādityā ripave vicṛttāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:540: RV_02.027.16.2{08} aśvīva tānati yeṣaṃ rathenāriṣṭā urāvā śarman syāma
GV01rv_02_u:541: RV_02.027.17.1{08} māhaṃ maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnamāpeḥ
GV01rv_02_u:542: RV_02.027.17.2{08} mā rāyo rājan suyamādava sthāṃ bṛhad vadema ...
GV01rv_02_u:543: RV_02.028.01.1{09} idaṃ kaverādityasya svarājo viśvāni sāntyabhyastu mahnā
GV01rv_02_u:544: RV_02.028.01.2{09} ati yo mandro yajathāya devaḥ sukīrtiṃ bhikṣe varuṇasya bhūreḥ
GV01rv_02_u:545: RV_02.028.02.1{09} tava vrate subhagāsaḥ syāma svādhyo varuṇa tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:546: RV_02.028.02.2{09} upāyana uṣasāṃ gomatīnāmagnayo na jaramāṇā anu dyūn
GV01rv_02_u:547: RV_02.028.03.1{09} tava syāma puruvīrasya śarmannuruśaṃsasya varuṇa praṇetaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:548: RV_02.028.03.2{09} yūyaṃ naḥ putrā aditeradabdhā abhi kṣamadhvaṃ yujyāya devāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:549: RV_02.028.04.1{09} pra sīmādityo asṛjad vidhartān ṛtaṃ sindhavo varuṇasya yanti
GV01rv_02_u:550: RV_02.028.04.2{09} na śrāmyanti na vi mucantyete vayo na paptū raghuyāparijman
GV01rv_02_u:551: RV_02.028.05.1{09} vi macchrathāya raśanāmivāga ṛdhyāma te varuṇa khāṃ ṛtasya
GV01rv_02_u:552: RV_02.028.05.2{09} mā tantuśchedi vayato dhiyaṃ me mā mātrā śāryapasaḥ pura ṛtoḥ
GV01rv_02_u:553: RV_02.028.06.1{10} apo su myakṣa varuṇa bhiyasaṃ mat samrāḷ ṛtāvo 'nu mā gṛbhāya
GV01rv_02_u:554: RV_02.028.06.2{10} dāmeva vatsād vi mumugdhyaṃho nahi tvadāre nimiṣaścaneśe
GV01rv_02_u:555: RV_02.028.07.1{10} mā no vadhairvaruṇa ye ta iṣṭāvenaḥ kṛṇvantamasura bhrīṇanti
GV01rv_02_u:556: RV_02.028.07.2{10} mā jyotiṣaḥ pravasathāni ganma vi ṣū mṛdhaḥ śiśratho jīvase naḥ
GV01rv_02_u:557: RV_02.028.08.1{10} namaḥ purā te varuṇota nūnamutāparaṃ tuvijāta bravāma
GV01rv_02_u:558: RV_02.028.08.2{10} tve hi kaṃ parvate na śritānyapracyutāni dūḷabha vratāni
GV01rv_02_u:559: RV_02.028.09.1{10} para ṛṇā sāvīradha matkṛtāni māhaṃ rājannanyakṛtena bhojam
GV01rv_02_u:560: RV_02.028.09.2{10} avyuṣṭā in nu bhūyasīruṣāsa ā no jīvān varuṇa tāsu śādhi
GV01rv_02_u:561: RV_02.028.10.1{10} yo me rājan yujyo vā sakhā vā svapne bhayaṃ bhīrave mahyamāha
GV01rv_02_u:562: RV_02.028.10.2{10} steno vā yo dipsati no vṛko vā tvaṃ tasmād varuṇapāhyasmān
GV01rv_02_u:564: RV_02.029.01.1{11} dhṛtavratā ādityā iṣirā āre mat karta rahasūrivāgaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:565: RV_02.029.01.2{11} śṛṇvato vo varuṇa mitra devā bhadrasya vidvānavase huvevaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:566: RV_02.029.02.1{11} yūyaṃ devāḥ pramatiryūyamojo yūyaṃ dveṣāṃsi sanutaryuyota
GV01rv_02_u:567: RV_02.029.02.2{11} abhikṣattāro abhi ca kṣamadhvamadyā ca no mṛḷayatāparaṃ ca
GV01rv_02_u:568: RV_02.029.03.1{11} kimū nu vaḥ kṛṇavāmāpareṇa kiṃ sanena vasava āpyena
GV01rv_02_u:569: RV_02.029.03.2{11} yūyaṃ no mitrāvaruṇādite ca svastimindrāmaruto dadhāta
GV01rv_02_u:570: RV_02.029.04.1{11} haye devā yūyamidāpaya stha te mṛḷata nādhamānāya mahyam
GV01rv_02_u:571: RV_02.029.04.2{11} mā vo ratho madhyamavāḷ ṛte bhūn mā yuṣmāvastvāpiṣu śramiṣma
GV01rv_02_u:572: RV_02.029.05.1{11} pra va eko mimaya bhūryāgo yan mā piteva kitavaṃ śaśāsa
GV01rv_02_u:573: RV_02.029.05.2{11} āre pāṣā āre aghāni devā mā mādhi putre vimiva grabhīṣṭa
GV01rv_02_u:574: RV_02.029.06.1{11} arvāñco adyā bhavatā yajatrā ā vo hārdi bhayamāno vyayeyam
GV01rv_02_u:575: RV_02.029.06.2{11} trādhvaṃ no devā nijuro vṛkasya trādhvaṃ kartādavapado yajatrāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:577: RV_02.030.01.1{12} ṛtaṃ devāya kṛṇvate savitra indrāyāhighne na ramanta āpaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:578: RV_02.030.01.2{12} ahar-aharyātyakturapāṃ kiyātyā prathamaḥ sarga āsām
GV01rv_02_u:579: RV_02.030.02.1{12} yo vṛtrāya sinamatrābhariṣyat pra taṃ janitrī viduṣa uvāca
GV01rv_02_u:580: RV_02.030.02.2{12} patho radantīranu joṣamasmai dive-dive dhunayo yantyartham
GV01rv_02_u:581: RV_02.030.03.1{12} ūrdhvo hyasthādadhyantarikṣe 'dhā vṛtrāya pra vadhaṃjabhāra
GV01rv_02_u:582: RV_02.030.03.2{12} mihaṃ vasāna upa hīmadudrot tigmāyudho ajayacchatrumindraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:583: RV_02.030.04.1{12} bṛhaspate tapuṣāśneva vidhya vṛkadvaraso asurasya vīrān
GV01rv_02_u:584: RV_02.030.04.2{12} yathā jaghantha dhṛṣatā purā cidevā jahi śatrumasmākamindra
GV01rv_02_u:585: RV_02.030.05.1{12} ava kṣipa divo aśmānamuccā yena śatruṃ mandasāno nijūrvāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:586: RV_02.030.05.2{12} tokasya sātau tanayasya bhūrerasmānardhaṃ kṛṇutādindra gonām
GV01rv_02_u:587: RV_02.030.06.1{13} pra hi kratuṃ vṛhatho yaṃ vanutho radhrasya stho yajamānasya codau
GV01rv_02_u:588: RV_02.030.06.2{13} indrāsomā yuvamasmānaviṣṭamasmin bhayasthe kṛṇutamu lokam
GV01rv_02_u:589: RV_02.030.07.1{13} na mā taman na śraman nota tandran na vocāma mā sunoteti somam
GV01rv_02_u:590: RV_02.030.07.2{13} yo me pṛṇād yo dadad yo nibodhād yo mā sunvantamupa gobhirāyat
GV01rv_02_u:591: RV_02.030.08.1{13} sarasvati tvamasmānaviḍḍhi marutvatī dhṛṣatī jeṣi śatrūn
GV01rv_02_u:592: RV_02.030.08.2{13} tyaṃ cicchardhantaṃ taviṣīyamāṇamindro hanti vṛṣabhaṃ śaṇḍikānām
GV01rv_02_u:593: RV_02.030.09.1{13} yo naḥ sanutya uta vā jighatnurabhikhyāya taṃ tigitena vidhya
GV01rv_02_u:594: RV_02.030.09.2{13} bṛhaspata āyudhairjeṣi śatrūn druhe rīṣantaṃ pari dhehi rājan
GV01rv_02_u:595: RV_02.030.10.1{13} asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra śūrairvīrya kṛdhi yāni te kartvāni
GV01rv_02_u:596: RV_02.030.10.2{13} jyogabhūvannanudhūpitāso hatvī teśāmā bharāno vasūni
GV01rv_02_u:597: RV_02.030.11.1{13} taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ mārutaṃ sumnayurgiropa bruve namasā daivyaṃ janam
GV01rv_02_u:598: RV_02.030.11.2{13} yathā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ naśāmahā apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ dive-dive
GV01rv_02_u:599: RV_02.031.01.1{14} asmākaṃ mitrāvaruṇāvataṃ rathamādityai rudrairvasubhiḥ sacābhuvā
GV01rv_02_u:600: RV_02.031.01.2{14} pra yad vayo na paptan vasmanas pari śravasyavohṛṣīvanto vanarṣadaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:601: RV_02.031.02.1{14} adha smā na udavatā sajoṣaso rathaṃ devāso abhi vikṣu vājayum
GV01rv_02_u:602: RV_02.031.02.2{14} yadāśavaḥ padyābhistitrato rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ sānau jaṅghananta pāṇibhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:603: RV_02.031.03.1{14} uta sya na indro viśvacarṣaṇirdivaḥ śardhena mārutena sukratuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:604: RV_02.031.03.2{14} anu nu sthātyavṛkābhirūtibhī rathaṃ mahe sanaye vājasātaye
GV01rv_02_u:605: RV_02.031.04.1{14} uta sya devo bhuvanasya sakṣaṇistvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ sajoṣā jūjuvad ratham
GV01rv_02_u:606: RV_02.031.04.2{14} iḷā bhago bṛhaddivota rodasī pūṣā purandhiraśvināvadhā patī
GV01rv_02_u:607: RV_02.031.05.1{14} uta tye devī subhage mithūdṛśoṣāsānaktā jagatāmapījuvā
GV01rv_02_u:608: RV_02.031.05.2{14} stuṣe yad vāṃ pṛthivi navyasā vaca sthātuśca vayastrivayā upastire
GV01rv_02_u:609: RV_02.031.06.1{14} uta vaḥ śaṃsamuśijāmiva śmasyahirbudhnyo 'ja ekapāduta
GV01rv_02_u:610: RV_02.031.06.2{14} trita ṛbhukṣāḥ savitā cano dadhe 'pāṃ napādāśuhemā dhiyā śami
GV01rv_02_u:611: RV_02.031.07.1{14} etā vo vaśmyudyatā yajatrā atakṣannāyavo navyase sam
GV01rv_02_u:612: RV_02.031.07.2{14} śravasyavo vājaṃ cakānāḥ saptirna rathyo aha dhītimaśyāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:613: RV_02.032.01.1{15} asya me dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāyato bhūtamavitrī vacasaḥ siṣāsataḥ
GV01rv_02_u:614: RV_02.032.01.2{15} yayorāyaḥ prataraṃ te idaṃ pura upastute vasūyurvāṃ maho dadhe
GV01rv_02_u:615: RV_02.032.02.1{15} mā no guhyā ripa āyorahan dabhan mā na ābhyo rīradho duchunābhyaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:616: RV_02.032.02.2{15} mā no vi yauḥ sakhyā viddhi tasya naḥ sumnāyatā manasā tat tvemahe
GV01rv_02_u:617: RV_02.032.03.1{15} aheḷatā manasā śruṣṭimā vaha duhānāṃ dhenuṃ pipyuṣīmasaścatam
GV01rv_02_u:618: RV_02.032.03.2{15} padyābhirāśuṃ vacasā ca vājinaṃ tvāṃ hinomi puruhūta viśvahā
GV01rv_02_u:619: RV_02.032.04.1{15} rākāmahaṃ suhavāṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā
GV01rv_02_u:620: RV_02.032.04.2{15} sīvyatvapaḥ sūcyāchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ sa=tadāyamukthyam
GV01rv_02_u:621: RV_02.032.05.1{15} yāste rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhirdadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni
GV01rv_02_u:622: RV_02.032.05.2{15} tābhirno adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrapoṣaṃ subhage rarāṇā
GV01rv_02_u:623: RV_02.032.06.1{15} sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānāmasi svasā
GV01rv_02_u:624: RV_02.032.06.2{15} juṣasva havyamāhutaṃ prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ
GV01rv_02_u:625: RV_02.032.07.1{15} yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ suṣūmā bahusūvarī
GV01rv_02_u:626: RV_02.032.07.2{15} tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana
GV01rv_02_u:627: RV_02.032.08.1{15} yā guṅgūryā sinīvālī yā rākā yā sarasvatī
GV01rv_02_u:629: RV_02.033.01.1{16} ā te pitarmarutāṃ sumnametu mā naḥ sūryasya sandṛṣo yuyothāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:630: RV_02.033.01.2{16} abhi no vīro arvati kṣameta pra jāyemahi rudra prajābhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:631: RV_02.033.02.1{16} tvādattebhī rudra śantamebhiḥ śataṃ himā aśīya bheṣajebhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:632: RV_02.033.02.2{16} vyasmad dveṣo vitaraṃ vyaṃho vyamīvāścātayasvā viṣūcīḥ
GV01rv_02_u:633: RV_02.033.03.1{16} śreṣṭho jātasya rudra śriyāsi tavastamastavasāṃ vajrabāho
GV01rv_02_u:634: RV_02.033.03.2{16} parṣi ṇaḥ pāramaṃhasaḥ svasti viśvā abhītī rapaso yuyodhi
GV01rv_02_u:635: RV_02.033.04.1{16} mā tvā rudra cukrudhāmā namobhirmā duṣṭutī vṛṣabha māsahūtī
GV01rv_02_u:636: RV_02.033.04.2{16} un no vīrānarpaya bheṣajebhirbhiṣaktamaṃ tvā bhiṣajāṃ śṛṇomi
GV01rv_02_u:637: RV_02.033.05.1{16} havīmabhirhavate yo havirbhirava stomebhī rudraṃ diṣīya
GV01rv_02_u:638: RV_02.033.05.2{16} ṛdūdaraḥ suhavo mā no asyai babhruḥ suśipro rīradhan manāyai
GV01rv_02_u:639: RV_02.033.06.1{17} un mā mamanda vṛṣabho marutvān tvakṣīyasā vayasā nādhamānam
GV01rv_02_u:640: RV_02.033.06.2{17} ghṛṇīva chāyāmarapā aśīyā vivāseyaṃ rudrasya sumnam
GV01rv_02_u:641: RV_02.033.07.1{17} kva sya te rudra mṛḷayākurhasto yo asti bheṣajo jalāṣaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:642: RV_02.033.07.2{17} apabhartā rapaso daivyasyābhī nu mā vṛṣabha cakṣamīthāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:643: RV_02.033.08.1{17} pra babhrave vṛṣabhāya śvitīce maho mahīṃ suṣṭutimīrayāmi
GV01rv_02_u:644: RV_02.033.08.2{17} namasyā kalmalīkinaṃ namobhirgṛṇīmasi tveṣaṃ rudrasya nāma
GV01rv_02_u:645: RV_02.033.09.1{17} sthirebhiraṅgaiḥ pururūpa ugro babhruḥ śukrebhiḥ pipiśehiraṇyaiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:646: RV_02.033.09.2{17} īśānādasya bhuvanasya bhūrerna vā u yoṣad rudrādasuryam
GV01rv_02_u:647: RV_02.033.10.1{17} arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanvārhan niṣkaṃ yajataṃ viśvarūpam
GV01rv_02_u:648: RV_02.033.10.2{17} arhannidaṃ dayase viśvamabhvaṃ na vā ojīyo rudra tvadasti
GV01rv_02_u:649: RV_02.033.11.1{18} stuhi śrutaṃ gartasadaṃ yuvānaṃ mṛgaṃ na bhīmamupahatnumugram
GV01rv_02_u:650: RV_02.033.11.2{18} mṛlā jaritre rudra stavāno 'nyaṃ te asman ni vapantu senāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:651: RV_02.033.12.1{18} kumāraścit pitaraṃ vandamānaṃ prati nānāma rudropayantam
GV01rv_02_u:652: RV_02.033.12.2{18} bhūrerdātāraṃ satpatiṃ gṛṇīṣe stutastvaṃ bheṣajā rāsyasme
GV01rv_02_u:653: RV_02.033.13.1{18} yā vo bheṣajā marutaḥ śucīni yā śantamā vṛṣaṇo yā mayobhu
GV01rv_02_u:654: RV_02.033.13.2{18} yāni manuravṛṇītā pitā nastā śaṃ ca yoścarudrasya vaśmi
GV01rv_02_u:655: RV_02.033.14.1{18} pari ṇo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ pari tveṣasya durmatirmahīgāt
GV01rv_02_u:656: RV_02.033.14.2{18} ava sthirā maghavadbhyastanuṣva mīḍhvastokāya tanayāya mṛḷa
GV01rv_02_u:657: RV_02.033.15.1{18} evā babhro vṛṣabha cekitāna yathā deva na hṛṇīṣe na haṃsi
GV01rv_02_u:658: RV_02.033.15.2{18} havanaśrun no rudreha bodhi bṛhad v. v. s.
GV01rv_02_u:659: RV_02.034.01.1{19} dhārāvarā maruto dhṛṣṇvojaso mṛgā na bhīmāstaviṣībhirarcinaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:660: RV_02.034.01.2{19} agnayo na śuśucānā ṛjīṣiṇo bhṛmiṃ dhamantoapa gā avṛṇvata
GV01rv_02_u:661: RV_02.034.02.1{19} dyāvo na stṛbhiścitayanta khādino vyabhriyā na dyutayantavṛṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:662: RV_02.034.02.2{19} rudro yad vo maruto rukmavakṣaso vṛṣājani pṛśnyāḥ śukra ūdhani
GV01rv_02_u:663: RV_02.034.03.1{19} ukṣante aśvānatyānivājiṣu nadasya karṇaisturayanta āśubhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:664: RV_02.034.03.2{19} hiraṇyaśiprā maruto davidhvataḥ pṛkṣaṃ yātha pṛṣatībhiḥ samanyavaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:665: RV_02.034.04.1{19} pṛkṣe tā viśvā bhuvanā vavakṣire mitrāya vā sadamā jīradānavaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:666: RV_02.034.04.2{19} pṛṣadaśvāso anavabhrarādhasa ṛjipyāso na vayuneṣu dhūrṣadaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:668: RV_02.034.05.2{19} ā haṃsāso na svasarāṇi gantana madhormadāya marutaḥ samanyavaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:669: RV_02.034.06.1{20} ā no brahmāṇi marutaḥ samanyavo narāṃ na śaṃsaḥ savanāni gantana
GV01rv_02_u:670: RV_02.034.06.2{20} aśvāmiva pipyata dhenumūdhani kartā dhiyaṃ jaritre vājapeśasam
GV01rv_02_u:671: RV_02.034.07.1{20} taṃ no dāta maruto vājinaṃ ratha āpānaṃ brahma citayad dive-dive
GV01rv_02_u:672: RV_02.034.07.2{20} iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo vṛjaneṣu kārave saniṃ medhāmariṣṭaṃ duṣṭaraṃ sahaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:673: RV_02.034.08.1{20} yad yuñjate maruto rukmavakṣaso 'śvān ratheṣu bhaga ā sudānavaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:674: RV_02.034.08.2{20} dhenurna śiśve svasareṣu pinvate janāya rātahaviṣe mahīmiṣam
GV01rv_02_u:675: RV_02.034.09.1{20} yo no maruto vṛkatāti martyo ripurdadhe vasavo rakṣatā riṣaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:676: RV_02.034.09.2{20} vartayata tapuṣā cakriyābhi tamava rudrā aśaso hantanā vadhaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:677: RV_02.034.10.1{20} citraṃ tad vo maruto yāma cekite pṛśnyā yadūdharapyāpayo duhuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:678: RV_02.034.10.2{20} yad vā nide navamānasya rudriyāstritaṃ jarāyajuratāmadābhyāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:679: RV_02.034.11.1{21} tān vo maho maruta evayāvno viṣṇoreṣasya prabhṛthe havāmahe
GV01rv_02_u:680: RV_02.034.11.2{21} hiraṇyavarṇān kakuhān yatasruco brahmaṇyantaḥ śaṃsyaṃ rādha īmahe
GV01rv_02_u:681: RV_02.034.12.1{21} te daśagvāḥ prathamā yajñamūhire te no hinvantūṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_02_u:682: RV_02.034.12.2{21} uṣā na rāmīraruṇairaporṇute maho jyotiṣāśucatā goarṇasā
GV01rv_02_u:683: RV_02.034.13.1{21} te kṣoṇībhiraruṇebhirnāñjibhī rudrā ṛtasya sadaneṣuvāvṛdhuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:684: RV_02.034.13.2{21} nimeghamānā atyena pājasā suścandraṃ varṇandadhire supeśasam
GV01rv_02_u:685: RV_02.034.14.1{21} tāniyāno mahi varūthamūtaya upa ghedenā namasā gṛṇīmasi
GV01rv_02_u:686: RV_02.034.14.2{21} trito na yān pañca hotṝnabhiṣṭaya āvavartadavarāñcakriyāvase
GV01rv_02_u:687: RV_02.034.15.1{21} yayā radhraṃ pārayathātyaṃho yayā nido muñcatha vanditāram
GV01rv_02_u:688: RV_02.034.15.2{21} arvācī sā maruto yā va ūtiro ṣu vāśreva sumatirjigātu
GV01rv_02_u:689: RV_02.035.01.1{22} upemasṛkṣi vājayurvacasyāṃ cano dadhīta nādyo giro me
GV01rv_02_u:690: RV_02.035.01.2{22} apāṃ napādāśuhemā kuvit sa supeśasas karati joṣiṣad dhi
GV01rv_02_u:691: RV_02.035.02.1{22} imaṃ svasmai hṛda ā sutaṣṭaṃ mantraṃ vocema kuvidasya vedat
GV01rv_02_u:692: RV_02.035.02.2{22} apāṃ napādasuryasya mahnā viśvānyaryo bhuvanā jajāna
GV01rv_02_u:693: RV_02.035.03.1{22} samanyā yantyupa yantyanyāḥ samānamūrvaṃ nadyaḥ pṛṇanti
GV01rv_02_u:694: RV_02.035.03.2{22} tamū śuciṃ śucayo dīdivāṃsamapāṃ napātaṃ pari tasthurāpaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:695: RV_02.035.04.1{22} tamasmerā yuvatayo yuvānaṃ marmṛjyamānāḥ pari yantyāpaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:696: RV_02.035.04.2{22} sa śukrebhiḥ śikvabhī revadasme dīdāyānidhmo ghṛtanirṇigapsu
GV01rv_02_u:697: RV_02.035.05.1{22} asmai tisro avyathyāya nārīrdevāya devīrdidhiṣantyannam
GV01rv_02_u:698: RV_02.035.05.2{22} kṛtā ivopa hi prasarsre apsu sa pīyūṣaṃ dhayati pūrvasūnām
GV01rv_02_u:699: RV_02.035.06.1{23} aśvasyātra janimāsya ca svardruho riṣaḥ sampṛcaḥ pāhisūrīn
GV01rv_02_u:700: RV_02.035.06.2{23} āmāsu pūrṣu paro apramṛṣyaṃ nārātayo vi naśan nānṛtāni
GV01rv_02_u:701: RV_02.035.07.1{23} sva ā dame sudughā yasya dhenuḥ svadhāṃ pīpāya subhvannamatti
GV01rv_02_u:702: RV_02.035.07.2{23} so apāṃ napādūrjayannapsvantarvasudeyāya vidhate vi bhāti
GV01rv_02_u:703: RV_02.035.08.1{23} yo apsvā sucinā daivyena ṛtāvājasra urviyā vibhāti
GV01rv_02_u:704: RV_02.035.08.2{23} vayā idanyā bhuvanānyasya pra jāyante vīrudhaśca prajābhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:705: RV_02.035.09.1{23} apāṃ napādā hyasthādupasthaṃ jihmānāmūrdhvo vidyutaṃ vasānaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:706: RV_02.035.09.2{23} tasya jyeṣṭhaṃ mahimānaṃ vahantīrhiraṇyavarṇāḥ pari yanti yahvīḥ
GV01rv_02_u:707: RV_02.035.10.1{23} hiraṇyarūpaḥ sa hiraṇyasandṛgapāṃ napāt sedu hiraṇyavarṇaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:708: RV_02.035.10.2{23} hiraṇyayāt pari yonerniṣadyā hiraṇyadā dadatyannamasmai
GV01rv_02_u:709: RV_02.035.11.1{24} tadasyānīkamuta cāru nāmāpīcyaṃ vardhate napturapām
GV01rv_02_u:710: RV_02.035.11.2{24} yamindhate yuvatayaḥ samitthā hiraṇyavarṇaṃ ghṛtamannamasya
GV01rv_02_u:711: RV_02.035.12.1{24} asmai bahūnāmavamāya sakhye yajñairvidhema namasā havirbhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:712: RV_02.035.12.2{24} saṃ sānu mārjmi didhiṣāmi bilmairdadhāmyannaiḥpari vanda ṛgbhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:713: RV_02.035.13.1{24} sa īṃ vṛṣājanayat tāsu garbhaṃ sa īṃ siśurdhayati taṃ rihanti
GV01rv_02_u:714: RV_02.035.13.2{24} so apāṃ napādanabhimlātavarṇo 'nyasyeveha tanvā viveṣa
GV01rv_02_u:715: RV_02.035.14.1{24} asmin pade parame tasthivāṃsamadhvasmabhirviśvahā dīdivāṃsām
GV01rv_02_u:716: RV_02.035.14.2{24} āpo naptre ghṛtamannaṃ vahantīḥ svayamatkaiḥ pari dīyanti yahvīḥ
GV01rv_02_u:717: RV_02.035.15.1{24} ayāṃsamagne sukṣitiṃ janāyāyāṃsamu maghavadbhyaḥ suvṛktim
GV01rv_02_u:719: RV_02.036.01.1{25} tubhyaṃ hinvāno vasiṣṭa gā apo 'dhukṣan sīmavibhiradribhirnaraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:720: RV_02.036.01.2{25} pibendra svāhā prahutaṃ vaṣatkṛtaṃ hotrādāsomaṃ prathamo ya īśiṣe
GV01rv_02_u:721: RV_02.036.02.1{25} yajñaiḥ sammiślāḥ pṛṣatībhirṛṣṭibhiryāmañchubhrāso añjiṣu priyā uta
GV01rv_02_u:722: RV_02.036.02.2{25} āsadyā barhirbharatasya sūnavaḥ potrādā somaṃ pibatā divo naraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:723: RV_02.036.03.1{25} ameva naḥ suhavā ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatanā raṇiṣṭana
GV01rv_02_u:724: RV_02.036.03.2{25} athā mandasva jujuṣāṇo andhasastvaṣṭardevebhirjanibhiḥ sumadgaṇaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:725: RV_02.036.04.1{25} ā vakṣi devāniha vipra yakṣi cośan hotarni ṣadā yoniṣu triṣu
GV01rv_02_u:726: RV_02.036.04.2{25} prati vīhi prasthitaṃ somyaṃ madhu pibāgnīdhrāttava bhāgasya tṛpṇuhi
GV01rv_02_u:727: RV_02.036.05.1{25} eṣa sya te tanvo nṛmṇavardhanaḥ saha ojaḥ pradivi bāhvorhitaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:728: RV_02.036.05.2{25} tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyamābhṛtastvamasya brāhmanādā tṛpat piba
GV01rv_02_u:729: RV_02.036.06.1{25} juṣethāṃ yajñaṃ bodhataṃ havasya me satto hotā nividaḥ pūrvyā anu
GV01rv_02_u:730: RV_02.036.06.2{25} achā rājānā nama etyāvṛtaṃ praśāstrādā pibataṃ somyaṃ madhu
GV01rv_02_u:731: RV_02.037.01.1{01} mandasva hotrādanu joṣamandhaso 'dhvaryavaḥ sa pūrṇāṃvaṣṭyāsicam
GV01rv_02_u:732: RV_02.037.01.2{01} tasmā etaṃ bharata tadvaśo dadirhotrād somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:733: RV_02.037.02.1{01} yamu pūrvamahuve tamidaṃ huve sedu havyo dadiryo nāma patyate
GV01rv_02_u:734: RV_02.037.02.2{01} adhvaryubhiḥ prasthitaṃ somyaṃ madhu potrāt somaṃ d. p. ṛ.
GV01rv_02_u:735: RV_02.037.03.1{01} medyantu te vahnayo yebhirīyase 'riṣaṇyan vīḷayasvā vanaspate
GV01rv_02_u:736: RV_02.037.03.2{01} āyūyā dhṛṣṇo abhigūryā tvaṃ neṣṭrāt somaṃ ...
GV01rv_02_u:737: RV_02.037.04.1{01} apād dhotrāduta potrādamattota neṣṭrādajuṣata prayo hitam
GV01rv_02_u:738: RV_02.037.04.2{01} turīyaṃ pātramamṛktamamartyaṃ draviṇodāḥ pibatu drāviṇodasaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:739: RV_02.037.05.1{01} arvāñcamadya yayyaṃ nṛvāhaṇaṃ rathaṃ yuñjāthāmiha vāṃ vimocanam
GV01rv_02_u:740: RV_02.037.05.2{01} pṛṅktaṃ havīṃṣi madhunā hi kaṃ gatamathā somaṃ pibataṃ vājinīvasū
GV01rv_02_u:741: RV_02.037.06.1{01} joṣyagne samidhaṃ joṣyāhutiṃ joṣi brahma janyaṃ joṣisuṣṭutim
GV01rv_02_u:742: RV_02.037.06.2{01} viśvebhirviśvān ṛtunā vaso maha uśan devānuśataḥ pāyayā haviḥ
GV01rv_02_u:743: RV_02.038.01.1{02} udu ṣya devaḥ savitā savāya śaśvattamaṃ tadapā vahnirasthāt
GV01rv_02_u:744: RV_02.038.01.2{02} nūnaṃ devebhyo vi hi dhāti ratnamathābhajad vītihotraṃ svastau
GV01rv_02_u:745: RV_02.038.02.1{02} viśvasya hi śruṣṭaye deva ūrdhvaḥ pra bāhavā pṛthupāṇiḥ sisarti
GV01rv_02_u:746: RV_02.038.02.2{02} āpaścidasya vrata ā nimṛgrā ayaṃ cid vāto ramate parijman
GV01rv_02_u:747: RV_02.038.03.1{02} āśubhiścid yān vi mucāti nūnamarīramadatamānaṃ cidetoḥ
GV01rv_02_u:748: RV_02.038.03.2{02} ahyarṣūṇāṃ cin nyayānaviṣyāmanu vrataṃ saviturmokyāgāt
GV01rv_02_u:749: RV_02.038.04.1{02} punaḥ samavyad vitataṃ vayantī madhyā kartornyadhācchakma dhīraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:750: RV_02.038.04.2{02} ut saṃhāyāsthād vy ṛtūṃ adardhararamatiḥsavitā deva āgāt
GV01rv_02_u:751: RV_02.038.05.1{02} nānaukāṃsi duryo viśvamāyurvi tiṣṭhate prabhavaḥ śoko agneḥ
GV01rv_02_u:752: RV_02.038.05.2{02} jyeṣṭhaṃ mātā sūnave bhāgamādhādanvasyaketamiṣitaṃ savitrā
GV01rv_02_u:754: RV_02.038.06.2{03} śaśvānapo vikṛtaṃ hitvyāgādanu vrataṃ saviturdaivyasya
GV01rv_02_u:755: RV_02.038.07.1{03} tvayā hitamapyamapsu bhāgaṃ dhanvānvā mṛgayaso vi tasthuḥ
GV01rv_02_u:756: RV_02.038.07.2{03} vanāni vibhyo nakirasya tāni vratā devasya saviturminanti
GV01rv_02_u:757: RV_02.038.08.1{03} yādrādhyaṃ varuṇo yonimapyamaniśitaṃ nimiṣi jarbhurāṇaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:758: RV_02.038.08.2{03} viśvo mārtāṇḍo vrajamā paśurgāt sthaśo janmāni savitā vyākaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:759: RV_02.038.09.1{03} na yasyendro varuṇo na mitro vratamaryamā na minanti rudraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:760: RV_02.038.09.2{03} nārātayastamidaṃ svasti huve devaṃ savitāraṃ namobhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:761: RV_02.038.10.1{03} bhagaṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantaḥ purandhiṃ narāśaṃso gnāspatirno avyāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:762: RV_02.038.10.2{03} āye vāmasya saṃgathe rayīṇāṃ priyā devasya savituḥ syāma
GV01rv_02_u:763: RV_02.038.11.1{03} asmabhyaṃ tad divo adbhyaḥ pṛthivyāstvayā dattaṃ kāmyaṃ rādha ā gāt
GV01rv_02_u:764: RV_02.038.11.2{03} śaṃ yat stotṛbhya āpaye bhavātyuruśaṃsāya savitarjaritre
GV01rv_02_u:765: RV_02.039.01.1{04} grāvāṇeva tadidathaṃ jarethe gṛdhreva vṛkṣaṃ nidhimantamacha
GV01rv_02_u:766: RV_02.039.01.2{04} brahmāṇeva vidatha ukthaśāsā dūteva havyā janyā purutrā
GV01rv_02_u:767: RV_02.039.02.1{04} prātaryāvāṇā rathyeva vīrājeva yamā varamā sacethe
GV01rv_02_u:768: RV_02.039.02.2{04} mene iva tanvā śumbhamāne dampatīva kratuvidā janeṣu
GV01rv_02_u:769: RV_02.039.03.1{04} śṛṅgeva naḥ prathamā gantamarvāk chaphāviva jarbhurāṇātarobhiḥ
GV01rv_02_u:770: RV_02.039.03.2{04} cakravākeva prati vastorusrārvāñcā yātaṃ rathyeva śakrā
GV01rv_02_u:771: RV_02.039.04.1{04} nāveva naḥ pārayataṃ yugeva nabhyeva na upadhīva pradhīva
GV01rv_02_u:772: RV_02.039.04.2{04} śvāneva no ariṣaṇyā tanūnāṃ khṛgaleva visrasaḥ pātamasmān
GV01rv_02_u:773: RV_02.039.05.1{04} vātevājuryā nadyeva rītirakṣī iva cakṣuṣā yātamarvāk
GV01rv_02_u:774: RV_02.039.05.2{04} hastāviva tanve śambhaviṣṭhā pādeva no nayataṃ vasyo acha
GV01rv_02_u:775: RV_02.039.06.1{05} oṣṭhāviva madhvāsne vadantā stanāviva pipyataṃ jīvasenaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:776: RV_02.039.06.2{05} nāseva nastanvo rakṣitārā karṇāviva suśrutā bhūtamasme
GV01rv_02_u:777: RV_02.039.07.1{05} hasteva śaktimabhi sandadī naḥ kṣāmeva naḥ samajataṃ rajāṃsi
GV01rv_02_u:778: RV_02.039.07.2{05} imā giro aśvinā yuṣmayantīḥ kṣṇotreṇeva svadhitiṃ saṃ śiśītam
GV01rv_02_u:779: RV_02.039.08.1{05} etāni vāmaśvinā vardhanāni brahma stomaṃ gṛtsamadāso akran
GV01rv_02_u:780: RV_02.039.08.2{05} tāni narā jujuṣāṇopa yātaṃ bṛhad ...
GV01rv_02_u:781: RV_02.040.01.1{06} somāpūṣaṇā jananā rayīṇāṃ jananā divo jananā pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:782: RV_02.040.01.2{06} jātau viśvasya bhuvanasya gopau devā akṛṇvannamṛtasya nābhim
GV01rv_02_u:783: RV_02.040.02.1{06} imau devau jāyamānau juṣantemau tamāṃsi gūhatāmajuṣṭā
GV01rv_02_u:785: RV_02.040.03.1{06} somāpūṣaṇā rajaso vimānaṃ saptacakraṃ rathamaviśvaminvam
GV01rv_02_u:786: RV_02.040.03.2{06} viṣūvṛtaṃ manasā yujyamānaṃ taṃ jinvatho vṛṣaṇā pañcaraśmim
GV01rv_02_u:787: RV_02.040.04.1{06} divyanyaḥ sadanaṃ cakra uccā pṛthivyāmanyo adhyantarikṣe
GV01rv_02_u:788: RV_02.040.04.2{06} tāvasmabhyaṃ puruvāraṃ purukṣuṃ rāyas poṣaṃ vi ṣyatāṃ nābhimasme
GV01rv_02_u:789: RV_02.040.05.1{06} viśvānyanyo bhuvanā jajāna viśvamanyo abhicakṣāṇa eti
GV01rv_02_u:790: RV_02.040.05.2{06} somāpūṣaṇāvavataṃ dhiyaṃ me yuvābhyāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayema
GV01rv_02_u:791: RV_02.040.06.1{06} dhiyaṃ pūṣā jinvatu viśvaminvo rayiṃ somo rayipatirdadhātu
GV01rv_02_u:793: RV_02.041.01.1{07} vāyo ye te sahasriṇo rathāsastebhirā gahi
GV01rv_02_u:795: RV_02.041.02.1{07} niyutvān vāyavā gahyayaṃ śukro ayāmi te
GV01rv_02_u:799: RV_02.041.04.1{07} ayaṃ vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā
GV01rv_02_u:803: RV_02.041.06.1{08} tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī ādityā dānunas patī
GV01rv_02_u:807: RV_02.041.08.1{08} na yat paro nāntara ādadharṣad vṛṣaṇvasū
GV01rv_02_u:809: RV_02.041.09.1{08} tā na ā voḷhamaśvinā rayiṃ piśaṅgasandṛśam
GV01rv_02_u:811: RV_02.041.10.1{08} indro aṅga mahad bhayamabhī ṣadapa cucyavat
GV01rv_02_u:813: RV_02.041.11.1{09} indraśca mṛḷayāti no na naḥ paścādaghaṃ naśat
GV01rv_02_u:815: RV_02.041.12.1{09} indra āśābhyas pari sarvābhyo abhayaṃ karat
GV01rv_02_u:817: RV_02.041.13.1{09} viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam
GV01rv_02_u:819: RV_02.041.14.1{09} tīvro vo madhumānayaṃ śunahotreṣu matsaraḥ
GV01rv_02_u:823: RV_02.041.16.2{10} apraśastā iva smasi praśastimamba nas kṛdhi
GV01rv_02_u:824: RV_02.041.17.1{10} tve viśvā sarasvati śritāyūṃṣi devyām
GV01rv_02_u:825: RV_02.041.17.2{10} śunahotreṣu matsva prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ
GV01rv_02_u:826: RV_02.041.18.1{10} imā brahma sarasvati juṣasva vājinīvati
GV01rv_02_u:827: RV_02.041.18.2{10} yā te manma gṛtsamadā ṛtāvari priyā deveṣu juhvati
GV01rv_02_u:828: RV_02.041.19.1{10} pretāṃ yajñasya śambhuvā yuvāmidā vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_02_u:830: RV_02.041.20.1{10} dyāvā naḥ pṛthivī imaṃ sidhramadya divispṛśam
GV01rv_02_u:832: RV_02.041.21.1{10} ā vāmupasthamadruhā devāḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ
GV01rv_02_u:834: RV_02.042.01.1{11} kanikradajjanuṣaṃ prabruvāṇa iyarti vācamariteva nāvam
GV01rv_02_u:835: RV_02.042.01.2{11} sumaṅgalaśca śakune bhavāsi mā tvā kā cidabhibhā viśvyā vidat
GV01rv_02_u:836: RV_02.042.02.1{11} mā tvā śyena ud vadhīn mā suparṇo mā tvā vidadiṣumānvīro astā
GV01rv_02_u:837: RV_02.042.02.2{11} pitryāmanu pradiśaṃ kanikradat sumaṅgalo bhadravādī vadeha
GV01rv_02_u:838: RV_02.042.03.1{11} ava kranda dakṣiṇato gṛhāṇāṃ sumaṅgalo bhadravādī śakunte
GV01rv_02_u:839: RV_02.042.03.2{11} mā na stena īśata māghaśaṃso bṛhad ...
GV01rv_02_u:840: RV_02.043.01.1{12} pradakṣinidabhi gṛṇanti kāravo vayo vadanta ṛtuthā śakuntayaḥ
GV01rv_02_u:841: RV_02.043.01.2{12} ubhe vācau vadati sāmagā iva gāyatraṃ ca traiṣṭubhaṃ cānu rājati
GV01rv_02_u:842: RV_02.043.02.1{12} udgāteva śakune sāma gāyasi brahmaputra iva savaneṣu śaṃsasi
GV01rv_02_u:843: RV_02.043.02.2{12} vṛṣeva vājī śiśumatīrapītyā sarvato naḥ śakune bhadramā vada viśvato naḥ śakune puṇyamā vada
GV01rv_02_u:844: RV_02.043.03.1{12} āvadaṃstvaṃ śakune bhadramā vada tūṣṇīmāsīnaḥ sumatiṃ cikiddhi naḥ
